Step 2: When Raibaru is not watching, sneak up to Osana's phone and deactivate her phone alarm.\r=2)Raibaruが目を離した隙にスマホのアラームを解除する。\r
Step 3: Wait until 5:55 PM for Senpai to get impatient and go home.=3)17:55まで待ちセンパイが帰る姿を確認する。

Reject Osana (Friday) Doctor Audio=失恋(金)プレイリストの改竄
Step 1: Purchase a directional microphone using Info-chan's Drops menu, and pick it up.\r\nStep 2: When Osana and Musume have a conversation, hide behind a nearby tree and record them.\r\nStep 3: Wait until after Osana has created a song playlist on her phone.\r\nStep 4: Use a bucket trap to splash Osana with water.\r\nStep 5: When Osana leaves her phone unattended in the girls' shower building, steal it.\r\nStep 6: Go to the computer lab and use a computer to edit Osana and Musume's conversation.\r\nStep 7: Place Osana's phone on her desk.\r\nStep 8: Wait for Osana to discover her phone.\r\nStep 9: Go to class and wait until lunchtime. Watch Osana give her phone to Senpai.\r\nStep 10: After 5:00 PM, watch Osana confess to Senpai.=1)インフォちゃんアプリから指向性マイクを購入し手に入れる。\r\n2)OsanaとMusumeの会話を付近の木の裏から録音する。\r\n3)Osanaがプレイリストを作成するまで待つ。\r\n4)バケツを使いOsanaに水を被せる。\r\n5:更衣室まで後をつけOsanaのスマホを盗む。\n6)パソコン室でOsanaとMusumeの会話を編集する。\r\n7)Osanaの机の上にスマホを置く。\r\n8)Osanaがスマホを見つけるのを待つ。\r\n9)授業を受け昼休みにOsanaがセンパイにスマホを渡すまで待つ。\r\n10)17:00まで待ちOsanaが謝る姿を確認する。
Step 1: Purchase a directional microphone using Info-chan's Drops menu, and pick it up.\r=1)インフォちゃんアプリから指向性マイクを購入し手に入れる。\r
Step 2: When Osana and Musume have a conversation, hide behind a nearby tree and record them.\r=2)OsanaとMusumeの会話を付近の木の裏から録音する。\r
Step 3: Wait until after Osana has created a song playlist on her phone.\r=3)Osanaがプレイリストを作成するまで待つ。\r
Step 4: Use a bucket trap to splash Osana with water.\r=4)バケツを使いOsanaに水を被せる。\r
Step 5: When Osana leaves her phone unattended in the girls' shower building, steal it.\r=5:更衣室まで後をつけOsanaのスマホを盗む。
Step 6: Go to the computer lab and use a computer to edit Osana and Musume's conversation.\r=6)パソコン室でOsanaとMusumeの会話を編集する。\r
Step 7: Place Osana's phone on her desk.\r=7)Osanaの机の上にスマホを置く。\r
Step 8: Wait for Osana to discover her phone.\r=8)Osanaがスマホを見つけるのを待つ。\r
Step 9: Go to class and wait until lunchtime. Watch Osana give her phone to Senpai.\r=9)授業を受け昼休みにOsanaがセンパイにスマホを渡すまで待つ。\r
Step 10: After 5:00 PM, watch Osana confess to Senpai.=10)17:00まで待ちOsanaが謝る姿を確認する。

Distract Raibaru=Raibaruの気をそらす
This scheme will teach you how to distract Raibaru for the duration of one school period.=このガイドによって一時的にRaibaruの気を逸らすことができます。
Step 1: Speak to Budo and accept his Task.\r\nStep 2: Speak to Raibaru while the Martial Arts Club is training.\r\n(The Martial Arts Club does not train during Classtime, Lunchtime, or Cleaning Time).=1)Budoと話しタスクを完了する。\r\n2)武道部の活動時間中にRaibaruと話す。\r\n(武道部は授業中・昼休み・清掃時間は活動しない。)
Step 1: Speak to Budo and accept his Task.\r=1)Budoと話しタスクを完了する。\r
Step 2: Speak to Raibaru while the Martial Arts Club is training.\r=2)武道部の活動時間中にRaibaruと話す。\r
(The Martial Arts Club does not train during Classtime, Lunchtime, or Cleaning Time).=(武道部は授業中・昼休み・清掃時間は活動しない。)

Poison Raibaru=Raibaruへの毒
This scheme will teach you how to send Raibaru to the girls' bathroom.=このガイドによってRaibaruを女子トイレに送ることが出来ます。
Step 1: Acquire emetic poison. There are three ways to do this.\r\n(Option 1) Purchase emetic poison from Info-chan's "Drops" menu.\r\n(Option 2) Join the Gardening Club to obtain a key to the gardening shed and obtain rat poison.\r\n(Option 3) Pickpocket the leader of the gardening club to gain access to the shed's poison.\r\nStep 2: At lunchtime, put emetic poison into Raibaru's bento when she is distracted.=1)催吐毒を手に入れる。(以下3通りの手段がある)\r\n(手段1)インフォちゃんアプリから購入する。\r\n(手段2)園芸部に入部し倉庫から殺鼠剤を手に入れる。\r\n(手段3)園芸部長にスリを働き手に入れた鍵で倉庫に入る。\r\n2)昼休みにRaibaruが目を離した隙にお弁当に毒を入れる。
Step 1: Acquire emetic poison. There are three ways to do this.\r=1)催吐毒を手に入れる。(以下3通りの手段がある)\r
(Option 1) Purchase emetic poison from Info-chan's "Drops" menu.\r=(手段1)インフォちゃんアプリから購入する。\r
(Option 2) Join the Gardening Club to obtain a key to the gardening shed and obtain rat poison.\r=(手段2)園芸部に入部し倉庫から殺鼠剤を手に入れる。\r
(Option 3) Pickpocket the leader of the gardening club to gain access to the shed's poison.\r=(手段3)園芸部長にスリを働き手に入れた鍵で倉庫に入る。\r
Step 2: At lunchtime, put emetic poison into Raibaru's bento when she is distracted.=2)昼休みにRaibaruが目を離した隙にお弁当に毒を入れる。

Shame Raibaru=Raibaruの評判を下げる
This scheme will teach you how to make Raibaru permanently stay away from Osana.=このガイドによってRaibaruをOsanaと同行させないようにできます。
Step 1: Take a photograph of Raibaru's face.\r\nStep 2: Speak to every student in school and gossip about Raibaru.\r\nIf you earn money and purchase the "Skimpy Sexy Panties", your gossip will be stronger.\r\nIf you increase your reputation at school, your gossip will be stronger.\r\nIf you are friends with the student you are gossiping with, your gossip will be stronger.\r\nIf you join the Gaming Club's computer and play a social game, your gossip will be stronger.\r\nIf you read adult manga, your gossip will be stronger with male students.\r\nUse the Student Info menu to check Raibaru's reputation.\r\nIf Raibaru's reputation is under -33, she will stop hanging out with Osana starting tomorrow.=1)Raibaruの顔写真を撮る。\r\n2)生徒たちと話しRaibaruの陰口をする。\r\n商店街で購入できる"露出度の高いエッチな下着"を着けていると、陰口の効果が上がる。\r\n学内での評判を高く維持していると、陰口の効果が上がる。\r\n友達になっている生徒に話すとき、陰口の効果が上がる。\r\nゲーム部に入部しゲームで社交性を上げると、陰口の効果が上がる。\r\n成年コミックを読んでいると、男子との陰口の効果が上がる。\r\n生徒情報からRaibaruの評判を確認する。\r\n-33を下回っていると翌日からOsanaと行動を共にしない。\n
Step 1: Take a photograph of Raibaru's face.\r=1)Raibaruの顔写真を撮る。\r
Step 2: Speak to every student in school and gossip about Raibaru.\r=2)生徒たちと話しRaibaruの陰口をする。\r
If you earn money and purchase the "Skimpy Sexy Panties", your gossip will be stronger.\r=商店街で購入できる"露出度の高いエッチな下着"を着けていると、陰口の効果が上がる。\r
If you increase your reputation at school, your gossip will be stronger.\r=学内での評判を高く維持していると、陰口の効果が上がる。\r
If you are friends with the student you are gossiping with, your gossip will be stronger.\r=友達になっている生徒に話すとき、陰口の効果が上がる。\r
If you join the Gaming Club's computer and play a social game, your gossip will be stronger.\r=ゲーム部に入部しゲームで社交性を上げると、陰口の効果が上がる。\r
If you read adult manga, your gossip will be stronger with male students.\r=成年コミックを読んでいると、男子との陰口の効果が上がる。\r
Use the Student Info menu to check Raibaru's reputation.\r=生徒情報からRaibaruの評判を確認する。\r
If Raibaru's reputation is under -33, she will stop hanging out with Osana starting tomorrow.=-33を下回っていると翌日からOsanaと行動を共にしない。

Kill Raibaru=Raibaruの殺害
This scheme will teach you how to make someone kill Raibaru.=このガイドによってRaibaruを洗脳した奴隷に襲わせて殺害できます。
Step 1: Kidnap a student. The Scheme list provides information about kidnapping.\r\nStep 2: In your home, torture the student until her sanity reaches zero.\r\nStep 3: Once the student's sanity has reached zero, bring the mind-broken student to school.\r\nStep 4: Take a picture of Raibaru's face.\r\nStep 5: Obtain two short sharp weapons.\r\nStep 6: Wait until Raibaru is not busy talking to Osana or waiting for Osana to do something.\r\nStep 7: Locate the mind-broken student sitting on the ground nearby the school gate.\r\nStep 8: Give the mind-broken student a weapon and tell her to attack Raibaru.\r\nStep 9: While Raibaru is being attacked, stab her.=1)生徒を誘拐する。(ガイドリストの中に方法を示したものがある)\r\n2)自宅の地下室で正気度を失うまで生徒を拷問する。\r\n3)生徒の正気度が0になったら学校に連れ出す。\r\n4)Raibaruの顔写真を撮る。\r\n5)小型の武器を2つ手に入れる。\r\n6)RaibaruがOsanaとの会話をやめるまで待つ。\r\n7)校門付近に座っている洗脳した生徒を見つける。\r\n8)武器を渡しRaibaruを襲わせる。\r\n9)Raibaruが襲われている後ろから更に攻撃する。
Step 1: Kidnap a student. The Scheme list provides information about kidnapping.\r=1)生徒を誘拐する。(ガイドリストの中に方法を示したものがある)\r
Step 2: In your home, torture the student until her sanity reaches zero.\r=2)自宅の地下室で正気度を失うまで生徒を拷問する。\r
Step 3: Once the student's sanity has reached zero, bring the mind-broken student to school.\r=3)生徒の正気度が0になったら学校に連れ出す。\r
Step 4: Take a picture of Raibaru's face.\r=4)Raibaruの顔写真を撮る。\r
Step 5: Obtain two short sharp weapons.\r=5)小型の武器を2つ手に入れる。\r
Step 6: Wait until Raibaru is not busy talking to Osana or waiting for Osana to do something.\r=6)RaibaruがOsanaとの会話をやめるまで待つ。\r
Step 7: Locate the mind-broken student sitting on the ground nearby the school gate.\r=7)校門付近に座っている洗脳した生徒を見つける。\r
Step 8: Give the mind-broken student a weapon and tell her to attack Raibaru.\r=8)武器を渡しRaibaruを襲わせる。\r
Step 9: While Raibaru is being attacked, stab her.=9)Raibaruが襲われている後ろから更に攻撃する。

How to Kidnap=女子生徒の誘拐方法
This scheme will teach you how to kidnap a student.=このガイドによって女子生徒を誘拐できます。
Step 1: Raise your Biology stat to Rank 1. There are two ways to do this.\r\n(Option 1) Invest study points into the Biology stat during class. It will take 2 days.\r\n(Option 2) Join the Gaming Club and use their computer to boost your Biology stat.\r\nStep 2: Steal a syringe from the infirmary without letting the nurse catch you.\r\nStep 3: Acquire a sedative. The Scheme list provides some Schemes for obtaining it.\r\nStep 4: Befriend a female student by completing that student's Task.\r\nStep 5: Ask the student to follow you.\r\nStep 6: Lead the student to the music case in the gym storage room.\r\nStep 7: Close the door, tranquilize the student, and put her into the music case.\r\nStep 8: Leave school.=1)生物学のステータスを1段階上げる。(以下2通りの手段がある)\r\n(手段1)授業で2日分のスタディポイントを投入する。)\r\n(手段2)ゲーム部に入部しパソコンから一時的に底上げする。)\r\n2)保健室で人目を避け注射器を盗む。\r\n3)鎮静剤を手に入れる。(ガイドリストの中に方法を示したものがある)\r\n4)女子生徒との会話からタスクを完了し友達になる。\r\n5)女子生徒に後をついて来るよう指示する。\r\n6)体育倉庫内の大きな箱まで誘導する。\r\n7)扉を閉め女子生徒の背後に立ち、注射器を突き刺し、箱に入れる。\r\n8)帰宅する。
Step 1: Raise your Biology stat to Rank 1. There are two ways to do this.\r=1)生物学のステータスを1段階上げる。(以下2通りの手段がある)\r
(Option 1) Invest study points into the Biology stat during class. It will take 2 days.\r=(手段1)授業で2日分のスタディポイントを投入する。)\r
(Option 2) Join the Gaming Club and use their computer to boost your Biology stat.\r=(手段2)ゲーム部に入部しパソコンから一時的に底上げする。)\r
Step 2: Steal a syringe from the infirmary without letting the nurse catch you.\r=2)保健室で人目を避け注射器を盗む。\r
Step 3: Acquire a sedative. The Scheme list provides some Schemes for obtaining it.\r=3)鎮静剤を手に入れる。(ガイドリストの中に方法を示したものがある)\r
Step 4: Befriend a female student by completing that student's Task.\r=4)女子生徒との会話からタスクを完了し友達になる。\r
Step 5: Ask the student to follow you.\r=5)女子生徒に後をついて来るよう指示する。\r
Step 6: Lead the student to the music case in the gym storage room.\r=6)体育倉庫内の大きな箱まで誘導する。\r
Step 7: Close the door, tranquilize the student, and put her into the music case.\r=7)扉を閉め女子生徒の背後に立ち、注射器を突き刺し、箱に入れる。\r
Step 8: Leave school.=8)帰宅する。

How to Obtain Emetic Poison=催吐毒の入手方法
This scheme will teach you how to obtain emetic poison.=このガイドによって催吐毒を入手出来ます。
(Option 1) Purchase Emetic Poison from Info-chan's "Drops" menu.\r\n(Option 2) Join the Gardening Club and find rat poison inside of the shed.\r\n(Option 3) Pickpocket the leader of the Gardening Club and open the shed with her key.=手段1)インフォちゃんアプリ内の"ドロップ"から嘔吐毒を購入する。\r\n手段2)園芸部に入部し倉庫から殺鼠剤を手に入れる。\r\n手段3)園芸部長にスリを働き手に入れた鍵で倉庫に入り殺鼠剤を手に入れる。
(Option 1) Purchase Emetic Poison from Info-chan's "Drops" menu.\r=手段1)インフォちゃんアプリ内の"ドロップ"から嘔吐毒を購入する。\r
(Option 2) Join the Gardening Club and find rat poison inside of the shed.\r=手段2)園芸部に入部し倉庫から殺鼠剤を手に入れる。\r
(Option 3) Pickpocket the leader of the Gardening Club and open the shed with her key.=手段3)園芸部長にスリを働き手に入れた鍵で倉庫に入り殺鼠剤を手に入れる。

How to Obtain a Sedative=鎮静剤の入手方法
This scheme will teach you how to obtain a sedative.=このガイドによって鎮静剤を入手出来ます。
(Option 1) Purchase a sedative from Info-chan's "Drops" menu.\r\n(Option 2) Purchase headache poison from Info-chan's "Drops" Menu.\r\nAt lunchtime, distract a student while they are eating.\r\nWhen the student leaves their food unattended, put the headache poison into their food.\r\nThe student will eat the poison and develop a headache.\r\nFollow the student to the nurse's office.\r\nThe student will ask the nurse for medicine.\r\nThe nurse will open the medicine cabinet and leave it unattended.\r\nWhen the medicine cabinet is unattended, steal a sedative from the cabinet.=手段1)インフォちゃんアプリ内の"ドロップ"から鎮静剤を購入する。\r\n手段2)インフォちゃんアプリ内の"ドロップ"から頭痛毒を購入する。\r\n昼休みに食事中の生徒の気をそらす。\r\n生徒が弁当から離れている間に頭痛毒を入れる。\r\n毒入り弁当を食べると頭痛を引き起こす。\r\n生徒に続いて保健室に向かう。\r\n生徒が薬について保険医に尋ねる。\r\n保険医が棚を開けたまま離れる時間がある。\r\n人目を避け棚から鎮静剤を盗む。
(Option 1) Purchase a sedative from Info-chan's "Drops" menu.\r=手段1)インフォちゃんアプリ内の"ドロップ"から鎮静剤を購入する。\r
(Option 2) Purchase headache poison from Info-chan's "Drops" Menu.\r=手段2)インフォちゃんアプリ内の"ドロップ"から頭痛毒を購入する。\r
At lunchtime, distract a student while they are eating.\r=昼休みに食事中の生徒の気をそらす。\r
When the student leaves their food unattended, put the headache poison into their food.\r=生徒が弁当から離れている間に頭痛毒を入れる。\r
The student will eat the poison and develop a headache.\r=毒入り弁当を食べると頭痛を引き起こす。\r
Follow the student to the nurse's office.\r=生徒に続いて保健室に向かう。\r
The student will ask the nurse for medicine.\r=生徒が薬について保険医に尋ねる。\r
The nurse will open the medicine cabinet and leave it unattended.\r=保険医が棚を開けたまま離れる時間がある。\r
When the medicine cabinet is unattended, steal a sedative from the cabinet.=人目を避け棚から鎮静剤を盗む。

How to Improve Your Reputation=評判を上げる方法
This scheme will teach you how to improve your reputation.=このガイドによって評判を上げることが出来ます。
There are two ways to improve your reputation.\r\n1. Complete Tasks for students.\r\n2. Compliment students.\r\nYour compliments will have a greater effect on your reputation if you:\r\nA. Purchase the "Sweet Strawberry Panties" from the lingerie store, and wear them to school.\r\nB. Read adult manga (only improves compliments towards male students).\r\nC. Level up your "Social" stat to Rank 1 (by studying in class or using the Gaming Club computer).\r\nD. Use a mirror to change your "Persona" to match the student you are complimenting.\r\nWhen your reputation marker is in the pink region, you have a "Good" reputation.\r\nYou must attend class in order for your reputation to update.=以下2通りの評判を上げる手段がある。\r\n1)生徒たちのタスクを完了する。\r\n2)生徒たちと適切な会話をする。\r\n下記によって効果を高めることが出来る。\r\nA)商店街で購入できる"いちごパンツ"を着用している。\r\nB)成年コミックを読んでいる。(男子生徒のみ対象)\r\nC)社交性のステータスが上昇している。\r\nD)鏡から各生徒に適したペルソナを選んでいる。\r\nマーカーがピンクのところにあると評判を高く維持できている。
There are two ways to improve your reputation.\r=以下2通りの評判を上げる手段がある。\r
1. Complete Tasks for students.\r=1)生徒たちのタスクを完了する。\r
2. Compliment students.\r=2)生徒たちと適切な会話をする。\r
Your compliments will have a greater effect on your reputation if you:\r=下記によって効果を高めることが出来る。\r
A. Purchase the "Sweet Strawberry Panties" from the lingerie store, and wear them to school.\r=A)商店街で購入できる"いちごパンツ"を着用している。\r
B. Read adult manga (only improves compliments towards male students).\r=B)成年コミックを読んでいる。(男子生徒のみ対象)\r
C. Level up your "Social" stat to Rank 1 (by studying in class or using the Gaming Club computer).\r=C)社交性のステータスが上昇している。\r
D. Use a mirror to change your "Persona" to match the student you are complimenting.\r=D)鏡から各生徒に適したペルソナを選んでいる。\r
When your reputation marker is in the pink region, you have a "Good" reputation.\r=マーカーがピンクのところにあると評判を高く維持できている。
You must attend class in order for your reputation to update.=評判を更新するには授業に出る必要がある

How to Steal Phones=スマホを盗む方法
This scheme will teach you how to steal phones from students and use them to acquire Info Points.=このガイドによって生徒のスマホを盗み、infoポイントを獲得出来ます。
1. Find a bucket and fill it with water.\r\n2. Place the bucket over a swinging door.\r\n3. Wait for a female student to walk through the door, or lure her through the door with giggles.\r\n4. After the student is splashed with water, follow her to the girls' shower building.\r\n5. The student will leave her phone unattended at her locker. This is your chance to steal it.\r\n6. Take the stolen phone to Info-chan's room and slide it under her door to recieve 20 Info Points.\r\n7. Retrieve the phone from Info-chan and place it on the student's desk to return it to her.\r\nIf you don't return the stolen phone, a teacher will eventually discover that you are the thief!=1)バケツを見つけ水を入れる。\r\n2)バケツを扉の上に設置する。(引き戸不可)\r\n3)笑い声で女子生徒を扉へ誘導する、又は通過を待つ。\r\n4)濡れた女子生徒に続いて更衣室に入る。\r\n5)その生徒がシャワーを浴びる際にロッカーにスマホを置き去りにする。\r\n6)スマホを盗みインフォちゃんルームに滑り込ませると20ポイントを獲得できる。\r\n7)インフォちゃんから回収したスマホを生徒の机の上に返す。\r\n生徒に返却しなかった場合、教師に窃盗を知られることとなる。
1. Find a bucket and fill it with water.\r=1)バケツを見つけ水を入れる。\r
2. Place the bucket over a swinging door.\r=2)バケツを扉の上に設置する。(引き戸不可)\r
3. Wait for a female student to walk through the door, or lure her through the door with giggles.\r=3)笑い声で女子生徒を扉へ誘導する、又は通過を待つ。\r
4. After the student is splashed with water, follow her to the girls' shower building.\r=4)濡れた女子生徒に続いて更衣室に入る。\r
5. The student will leave her phone unattended at her locker. This is your chance to steal it.\r=5)その生徒がシャワーを浴びる際にロッカーにスマホを置き去りにする。\r
6. Take the stolen phone to Info-chan's room and slide it under her door to recieve 20 Info Points.\r=6)スマホを盗みインフォちゃんルームに滑り込ませると20ポイントを獲得できる。\r
7. Retrieve the phone from Info-chan and place it on the student's desk to return it to her.\r=7)インフォちゃんから回収したスマホを生徒の机の上に返す。\r
If you don't return the stolen phone, a teacher will eventually discover that you are the thief!=生徒に返却しなかった場合、教師に窃盗を知られることとなる。
Drive To Murder=Incentivo ao Assasinato
This scheme will teach you how to trick another student into murdering Osana for you.=このガイドによって他の生徒にOsanaを殺害させる方法がわかります。
Step 1: Gossip about Horuda Puresu until you have brought her reputation beneath -33.\r\nStep 2: Advance forward to the next day.\r\nStep 3: Speak to one of the tan bully girls and complete her Task to befriend her.\r\nStep 4: Ask the bully for a favor and tell her to speak to Osana.\r\nStep 5: Take a photograph of a bully speaking with Osana.\r\nStep 6: Put a note in Horuda Puresu's locker and arrange a meeting behind school to discuss Bullying.\r\nStep 7: Tell Horuda to go check her locker for a note.\r\nStep 8: Meet with Horuda and show her the photograph of Osana talking with a bully.\r\nStep 9: Advance forward to the next day.\r\nStep 10: Horuda will murder Osana.=1)Horuda Puresuの噂話をして評判を-33未満にする。\r\n2)次の日に進める。\r\n3)黒ギャル(いじめっ子)の一人に話しかけてタスクを完了させ、友人になる。\r\n4)その黒ギャルにOsanaと会話するよう頼む。\r\n5)黒ギャルがOsanaと会話している様子を撮影する。\r\n6)Horuda Puresuのロッカーにいじめについて校舎裏で話したいと書いたメモを残す。\r\n7)Horudaにロッカーのメモのことを伝える。\r\n8)校舎裏でHorudaに会いOsanaと黒ギャルが話している写真を見せる。\r\n9)次の日に進める。\r\n10)HorudaがOsanaを殺害する。\r
Step 1: Gossip about Horuda Puresu until you have brought her reputation beneath -33.\r=1)Horuda Puresuの噂話をして評判を-33未満にする。\r
Step 2: Advance forward to the next day.\r=2)次の日に進める。\r
Step 3: Speak to one of the tan bully girls and complete her Task to befriend her.\r=3)黒ギャル(いじめっ子)の一人に話しかけてタスクを完了させ、友人になる。\r
Step 4: Ask the bully for a favor and tell her to speak to Osana.\r=4)その黒ギャルにOsanaと会話するよう頼む。\r
Step 5: Take a photograph of a bully speaking with Osana.\r=5)黒ギャルがOsanaと会話している様子を撮影する。\r
Step 6: Put a note in Horuda Puresu's locker and arrange a meeting behind school to discuss Bullying.\r=6)Horuda Puresuのロッカーにいじめについて校舎裏で話したいと書いたメモを残す。\r
Step 7: Tell Horuda to go check her locker for a note.\r=7)Horudaにロッカーのメモのことを伝える。\r
Step 8: Meet with Horuda and show her the photograph of Osana talking with a bully.\r=8)校舎裏でHorudaに会いOsanaと黒ギャルが話している写真を見せる。\r
Step 9: Advance forward to the next day.\r=9)次の日に進める。\r
Step 10: Horuda will murder Osana.=10)HorudaがOsanaを殺害する。\r







コピペ元出力
Something is...=Algo está...
...wrong...=...errado...
...with me.=...comigo.
For as long as I can remember, I've always felt...empty. Incomplete.=Desde que me lembro, sempre me senti...vazia. Incompleta.
Like a part of me is...missing.=Como se uma parte de mim estivesse...faltando.
This hollow feeling has dominated my life.=Essa sensação de vazio dominou minha vida.
I've never been able to feel anything else.=Nunca consegui sentir mais nada.
My world has always been cold...dark...silent.=Meu mundo sempre foi frio...escuro...silencioso.
My mother was exactly like me when she was a child.=Minha mãe era exatamente como eu quando era criança.
But when she met my father, everything changed for her.=Mas quando ela conheceu meu pai, tudo mudou para ela.
He brought warmth and color and life into her world.=Ele trouxe calor, cor e vida para o mundo dela.
He made her...complete.=Ele a fez...completa.
She told me that, one day, I'd meet someone special, just like she did.=Ela me disse que, um dia, eu encontraria alguém especial, assim como ela fez.
Someone who would cure me...fix me...save me.=Alguém que me curaria...me consertaria...me salvaria.
I've spent my entire life waiting for that day...=Passei toda a minha vida esperando por esse dia...
...dreaming of the moment when I'd meet the person who would complete me.=...sonhando com o momento em que eu encontraria a pessoa que me completaria.
It was the only thing for me to look forward to.=Era a única coisa pela qual eu esperava.
It was my only reason to live.=Era minha única razão de viver.
And then...one day...=E então...um dia...
...I found him.=...eu o encontrei.
When I met him, something changed inside of me.=Quando eu o conheci, algo mudou dentro de mim.
My world was filled with color and light.=Meu mundo foi preenchido com cor e luz.
It was like I had opened my eyes for the first time.=Foi como se eu tivesse aberto meus olhos pela primeira vez.
I felt warm. I felt complete. I felt...alive.=Eu me senti aquecida. Eu me senti completa. Eu me senti...viva.
He is my escape from the cold, grey, empty world I've been trapped in.=Ele é minha fuga do mundo frio, cinza e vazio em que eu estava presa.
He is the one I've been waiting for.=Ele é a pessoa que eu estava esperando.
The person I want to spend the rest of my life with.=A pessoa com quem eu quero passar o resto da minha vida.
But...=Mas...
...someone...is trying to take him from me.=...alguém...está tentando tirá-lo de mim.
She wants him, but not in the same way that I want him.=Ela o quer, mas não da mesma forma que eu o quero.
She could never appreciate him the way I do.=Ela nunca poderia apreciar ele da maneira que eu aprecio.
She doesn't deserve him.=Ela não o merece.
He belongs to me.=Ele pertence a mim.
I have to stop her.=Eu tenho que detê-la.
Even if it means hurting her.=Mesmo que isso signifique machucá-la.
Even if it means killing her.=Mesmo que isso signifique matá-la.
There is nothing I won't do for him.=Não há nada que eu não faria por ele.
I won't let anyone come between us.=Eu não vou deixar ninguém se interpor entre nós.
I don't care what I have to do.=Eu não me importo com o que eu tenha que fazer.
I don't care who I have to hurt.=Eu não me importo com quem eu tenha que machucar.
I don't care whose blood I have to spill.=Eu não me importo de quem seja o sangue que eu tenha que derramar.
I won't let anyone take him from me.=Eu não vou deixar ninguém tirá-lo de mim.
Nothing else matters.=Nada mais importa.
No one else matters.=Ninguém mais importa.
He. Will. Be. Mine.=Ele. Será. Meu.
He doesn't have a choice.=Ele não tem escolha.


インフォちゃんとのチャット
Hey.=Ei.
Do I know you?=Eu te conheço?
I saw you stalking an upperclassman today.=Hoje, eu vi você seguindo um veterano.
I'm sorry, there must be some misunderstanding.=Desculpe, mas deve haver algum mal-entendido.
There's no need to play dumb with me. I'm trying to help you. Want some information about the girl he was with?=Não precisa bancar a ingênua comigo. Estou tentando te ajudar. Quer algumas informações sobre a garota com quem ele estava?
I'm listening.=Estou ouvindo.
Her name is Osana Najimi. She has a crush on him.=O nome dela é Osana Najimi. Ela está apaixonada por ele.
She's planning to confess to him next Friday...underneath the cherry tree behind the school.=Ela está planejando se confessar para ele na próxima sexta-feira... debaixo da cerejeira atrás da escola.
There's a myth that if you confess your love to someone underneath that tree, the person you confess to can't refuse.=Existe um mito de que, se você se confessar para alguém debaixo dessa árvore, a pessoa não pode recusar.
Why are you telling me this?=Por que está me contando isso?
I would be happy if something bad happened to Osana-chan. I think you might be the right person to give her what she deserves.=Eu ficaria feliz se algo ruim acontecesse com a Osana-chan. Acho que você pode ser a pessoa certa para dar a ela o que ela merece.
Who are you?=Quem é você?
Have you ever heard of "Info-chan"?=Já ouviu falar de "Info-chan"?
An urban legend about a girl who hacks people and sells their dirty secrets to the highest bidder.=Uma lenda urbana sobre uma garota que hackeia as pessoas e vende seus segredos sujos para o maior lance.
That's just the tip of the iceberg. I sell a lot more than just blackmail.=Isso é só a ponta do iceberg. Eu vendo muito mais do que apenas chantagem.
Are you trying to tell me that you're Info-chan? Do you really expect me to believe that?=Está tentando me dizer que você é a Info-chan? Acha mesmo que vou acreditar nisso?
I've installed an app on your phone. Take a look.=Instalei um aplicativo no seu celular. Dê uma olhada.
How did you do that?=Como você fez isso?
That's not something you need to be concerned with.=Isso não é algo com que você precise se preocupar.
If you do a few small favors for me, I can offer a wide variety of services that should help you eliminate Osana-chan. Everything you need to know is in that app.=Se você fizer alguns favores para mim, posso oferecer uma variedade de serviços que vão te ajudar a eliminar a Osana-chan. Tudo o que você precisa saber está nesse aplicativo.
And what if I don't want anything to do with you?=E se eu não quiser nada com você?
If you're not interested in my services, I won't take it personally. Feel free to ignore me.=Se não estiver interessada nos meus serviços, não vou levar para o lado pessoal. Fique à vontade para me ignorar.
But DON'T ignore Osana-chan. You have one week until she confesses to your precious Senpai.=Mas NÃO ignore a Osana-chan. Você tem uma semana até que ela se confesse ao seu precioso Senpai.
Make her suffer.=Faça ela sofrer.

1980年代
NEXT=次へ
SKIP=スキップ
SKIP CUTSCENE=カットシーンをスキップ
IF THIS IS YOUR FIRST TIME PLAYING THE GAME, SKIPPING THE TUTORIAL IS NOT RECOMMENDED.\n\nARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO SKIP THE TUTORIAL?=このゲームの初心者にはチュートリアルをスキップするのはオススメできません。\n\nチュートリアルをスキップしますか？
Every night, for as long as I can remember, I have been having the same dream.=物心ついた時から、毎晩ずっと同じ夢を見ていた。
In this dream, I meet a boy, fall in love with him, start a family, and live happily ever after.=ある男の人と出会い、恋に落ち、家族となり、幸せになる夢。
I've always believed that this dream was showing me my future... showing me the person I'll be with for the rest of my life.=ずっとこの夢が正夢なんだと信じていた。この男の人が私の運命の人なんだと。
I spent years fantasizing about what it would be like to finally meet him...=何年もの間、いつかあの人に出会えたらと想像していた。
...and then, one year ago...=そして、一年前...
The boy from my dreams is in the same school as me!!=夢に出てきたあの人が私と同じ学校にいた！
But... I'm too afraid to speak to him... because I'm worried that I'll ruin everything... and make him hate me...=でも...怖くて話せなかった...全て台無しになっちゃうんじゃないか、嫌われてしまうんじゃないかと思って...
...so, for the past year, I've been admiring him from afar while I build up enough courage to speak to him.=だから、ここ一年間は彼を遠くから眺めて話しかける勇気を出そうとしていた。
He's my soulmate... my destiny...=彼と私は魂で結ばれている...運命の人...
...but, while we're at school... he's just my "Senpai."=...でも、学校にいる間はただの先輩と後輩。
I was having so much fun watching him, learning everything about him, and planning our life together...=彼を見ているのが楽しくて、彼のすべてを知って、一緒に生きるプランを考えていた...
...but, then, someone had to come and ruin everything.=...でも、誰かがやってきてすべてを台無しにした。
She's trying to take him from me...=あの女は彼を奪おうとしている。
...and I won't let her get away with it.=絶対に逃がさない。
Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to rotate the camera.=W、A、S、Dで移動できます。マウスでカメラを操作できます。
Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to rotate the camera. Hold Left Shift to run.=W、A、S、Dで移動できます。マウスでカメラを操作できます。左Shiftキーで走ることができます。
TITLE SCREEN=TELA DE TÍTULO
CLOSE MENU=FECHAR MENU
TOGGLE 80S EFFECTS=ALTERNAR EFEITOS DO MODO DOS ANOS 80
SKIP TUTORIAL=PULAR TUTORIAL
Press the "T" key to spawn a trail leading to your next destination.=Pressione a tecla "T" para criar uma trilha que leva ao seu próximo destino.
Follow the trail. "T" will spawn a new trail.=Siga a trilha. "T" criará uma nova trilha.
Hold down the "E" key to open the door.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para abrir a porta.
Press the "E" key to open the door.=Pressione a tecla "E" para abrir a porta.
Press "T" to spawn a new trail and follow it.=Pressione "T" para criar uma nova trilha e segui-la.
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the knife.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar a faca.
Press the "1" key to hide the knife.=Pressione a tecla "1" para esconder a faca.
Hold down the "E" key to pick up the roll of masking tape.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para pegar o rolo de fita adesiva.
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the box of garbage bags.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar a caixa de sacos de lixo.
Hold down the "Q" key to craft a makeshift bodybag.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "Q" para criar um saco para corpo improvisado.
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the makeshift bodybag.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar o saco para corpo improvisado.
Press the "1" key to drop the makeshift bodybag.=Pressione a tecla "1" para soltar o saco para corpo improvisado.
Enter the bathroom stall.=Entre na cabine do banheiro.
Close the bathroom stall door.=Feche a porta da cabine do banheiro.
Who would want to talk with me in a place like this...?=Quem iria querer falar comigo em um lugar como este...?
Exit the bathroom stall and approach the girl.=Saia da cabine do banheiro e aproxime-se da garota.
Hold down the "E" key to talk to the girl.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para conversar com a garota.
Oh! Ryoba-chan! Are...are you the person who left that note in my locker? ...what did you want to talk to me about?=Oh! Ryoba-chan! Você... você é a pessoa que deixou aquele bilhete no meu armário? ...sobre o que você queria falar comigo?
I need to tell you something about the boy you have feelings for.=Eu preciso te contar algo sobre o garoto por quem você tem sentimentos.
Ahhhhh! You know who I have a crush on?! Ohhhhh, that's so embarassiiiiing!=Ahhhhh! Você sabe em quem eu tenho uma queda?! Ohhhhh, que vergonhaaaaa!
Well...what is it? What did you want to tell me?=Então... o que é? O que você queria me contar?
Press the "2" key to take out your knife.=Pressione a tecla "2" para sacar a faca.
Press the "F" key.=Pressione a tecla "F".
You can't have him. He belongs to me.=Você não pode ficar com ele. Ele pertence a mim.
Return to the makeshift bodybag you dropped and pick it up by holding down the "R" key.=Volte para o saco para corpo improvisado que você deixou cair e pegue-o mantendo pressionada a tecla "R".
Locate the box of garbage bags in the bathroom and pick them up by holding down the "R" key.=Encontre a caixa de sacos de lixo no banheiro e pegue-a mantendo pressionada a tecla "R".
Bring the makeshift bodybag to the corpse and hold down the "E" key to conceal it.=Leve o saco para corpo improvisado até o corpo e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para escondê-lo.
Bring the garbage bags to the corpse and hold down the "E" key to wrap the corpse in a bag.=Leve os sacos de lixo até o corpo e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para embrulhar o corpo no saco.
Press the "1" key to drop the box of garbage bags.=Pressione a tecla "1" para soltar a caixa de sacos de lixo.
Locate the bucket in the bathroom and pick it up by holding down the "R" key.=Encontre o balde no banheiro e pegue-o mantendo pressionada a tecla "R".
Bring the bucket to the large sink and hold down the "E" key to fill it with water.=Leve o balde até a pia grande e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para enchê-lo com água.
Press the "1" key to drop the bucket.=Pressione a tecla "1" para soltar o balde.
Locate the bleach in the bathroom and pick it up by holding down the "R" key.=Encontre o alvejante no banheiro e pegue-o mantendo pressionada a tecla "R".
Bring the bleach to the bucket and pour it in by holding down the "E" key.=Leve o alvejante até o balde e despeje-o mantendo pressionada a tecla "E".
Press the "1" key to drop the bleach.=Pressione a tecla "1" para soltar o alvejante.
Locate the mop in the bathroom and pick it up by holding down the "R" key.=Encontre o esfregão no banheiro e pegue-o mantendo pressionada a tecla "R".
Bring the mop to the bucket and dip it in by holding down the "E" key.=Leve o esfregão até o balde e mergulhe-o mantendo pressionada a tecla "E".
Hold down the left "Ctrl" key to activate "Yandere Vision". An orange square will appear around any blood that is present nearby.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "Ctrl" esquerda para ativar a "Visão Yandere". Um quadrado laranja aparecerá ao redor de qualquer sangue presente nas proximidades.
Hold down the "E" key to sweep up any blood that is present in the room.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para varrer qualquer sangue presente na sala.
Press the "1" key to drop the mop.=Pressione a tecla "1" para soltar o esfregão.
Approach the corpse and hold down the "R" key to pick it up.=Aproxime-se do corpo e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-lo.
Hold down the "R" key to dump the corpse into the incinerator.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para jogar o corpo no incinerador.
Hold down the "R" key to dump the weapon into the incinerator.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para jogar a arma no incinerador.
Hold down the "E" key to open the locker door.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para abrir a porta do armário.
Hold down the "Q" key to remove your blood-stained clothing.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "Q" para remover sua roupa manchada de sangue.
Hold down the "E" key to take a shower.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para tomar um banho.
Hold down the "R" key to change into your gym clothing.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para trocar para sua roupa de ginástica.
Approach the blood-stained clothing you dropped and pick it up by holding down the "R" key.=Aproxime-se da roupa manchada de sangue que você deixou cair e pegue-a mantendo pressionada a tecla "R".
Hold down the "R" key to dump the bloody clothing into the incinerator.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para jogar a roupa manchada de sangue no incinerador.
Hold down the "E" key to activate the incinerator.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para ativar o incinerador.
At the bottom-right corner of the screen, you can see your current Sanity. Press the "E" key to continue.=No canto inferior direito da tela, você pode ver sua Sanidade atual. Pressione a tecla "E" para continuar.
Your Sanity is low. Rapidly press the Left Ctrl key to laugh until your sanity returns to 100%.=Sua Sanidade está baixa. Pressione rapidamente a tecla Ctrl esquerda para rir até que sua sanidade retorne a 100%.
Hey, Ryoba-chan...I saw you take a knife out of the Cooking Club...why did you do that?=Ei, Ryoba-chan... Eu vi você pegar uma faca do Clube de Culinária... por que você fez isso?
At the bottom-left corner of the screen, you can see your current Reputation. Press the "E" key to continue.=No canto inferior esquerdo da tela, você pode ver sua Reputação atual. Pressione a tecla "E" para continuar.
Approach the student who witnessed your suspicious behavior.=Aproxime-se do aluno que testemunhou seu comportamento suspeito.
Hold down the "E" key to talk to this student.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para conversar com este aluno.
Move the mouse up to highlight the "Apologize" option. Then, press the E key.=Mova o mouse para cima para destacar a opção "Desculpar-se". Então, pressione a tecla "E".
Oh, that knife actually belonged in the Home Ec room. I was just putting it back where it belonged.=Ah, aquela faca realmente pertencia à sala de Educação Doméstica. Eu estava apenas colocando-a de volta no lugar.
At the top-right corner of the screen, you can see the current time of day. Press the "E" key to continue.=No canto superior direito da tela, você pode ver a hora atual do dia. Pressione a tecla "E" para continuar.
It's almost time to go home. You can explore the school, or press "T" to spawn a trail and follow it to the school exit.=Já está quase na hora de ir para casa. Você pode explorar a escola, ou pressionar "T" para criar uma trilha e segui-la até a saída da escola.
After I disposed of the girl who was trying to steal my Senpai, I cleaned up all the evidence.=Depois de me livrar da garota que estava tentando roubar meu Senpai, eu limpei todas as evidências.
I left no trace of what I had done...=Não deixei nenhum traço do que eu havia feito...
...or so I thought.=...ou assim eu pensava.
When the police investigated the girl's disappearance, they found a single blood stain that I failed to clean up.=Quando a polícia investigou o desaparecimento da garota, encontraram uma única mancha de sangue que eu não consegui limpar.
This was enough to make the police begin investigating the girl's disappearance as a possible murder case.=Isso foi o suficiente para fazer a polícia começar a investigar o desaparecimento da garota como um possível caso de assassinato.
A potential murder at an elite school was big news. It was a stain on the school's prestigious reputation.=Um possível assassinato em uma escola de elite foi uma grande notícia. Foi uma mancha na prestigiosa reputação da escola.
The headmaster didn't take it very well.=O diretor não reagiu bem a isso.
I heard that he struck a deal with the police to keep any future investigations as discreet as possible.=Ouvi dizer que ele fez um acordo com a polícia para manter qualquer investigação futura o mais discreta possível.
The faculty and the student council will be on high alert from now on. I'll need to be more careful in the future...=O corpo docente e o conselho estudantil estarão em alerta máximo a partir de agora. Vou precisar ser mais cuidadosa no futuro...
...but I can't rest yet. Another threat has appeared.=...mas eu ainda não posso descansar. Outra ameaça surgiu.
She plans to confess her feelings to my Senpai at 6:00 PM on Friday. I need to stop her before then.=Ela planeja confessar seus sentimentos ao meu Senpai às 18:00 na sexta-feira. Eu preciso impedi-la antes disso.
If I kill every girl who shows an interest in my Senpai, I might attract more police attention to the school...=Se eu matar todas as garotas que demonstram interesse no meu Senpai, eu posso atrair mais atenção da polícia para a escola...
...so, even though I'm tempted to plunge a knife into her heart... perhaps I should consider avoiding bloodshed.=...então, mesmo que eu esteja tentada a cravar uma faca em seu coração... talvez eu deva considerar evitar o derramamento de sangue.
I should eavesdrop on their conversations. I might be able to learn some valuable information. In fact...=Eu deveria espionar as conversas deles. Talvez eu consiga obter algumas informações valiosas. Na verdade...
With a little bit of sabotage, I might be able to ruin their budding relationship and make my Senpai lose all interest in her...=Com um pouco de sabotagem, eu posso conseguir destruir o relacionamento incipiente deles e fazer meu Senpai perder todo interesse nela...
Obtain ammonium, obtain balloons, craft a stink bomb, and throw it at Ui Tunesu.=Obtenha amônia, obtenha balões, crie uma bomba de cheiro ruim e jogue-a em Ui Tunesu.

コントローラー操作
Use the left control stick to move, and the right control stick to rotate the camera.=左スティックで移動できます。右スティックでカメラを操作できます。
Use the left control stick to move, and the right control stick to rotate the camera. Hold LB to run.=左スティックで移動できます。右スティックでカメラを操作できます。LBボタンで走ることができます。
Follow the trail. Clicking the left stick will spawn a new trail.=左スティックを押し込むと目的地までのルートが表示されます。辿ってみましょう。
Click in the left control stick to spawn a trail leading to your next destination.=左スティックを押し込むと新しいルートが表示されます。辿ってみましょう。
Hold down the "A" button to open the door.=「A」ボタン長押しでドアを開けましょう。
Press the "A" button to open the door.=「A」ボタンを押してドアを開けましょう。
Click the left stick to spawn a new trail and follow it.=左スティックを押し込んでルートを表示し、それを辿りましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the knife.=「Y」ボタン長押しでナイフを拾えます。
Press down on the directional pad to hide the knife.=十字キー下を押してナイフを隠しましょう。
Hold down the "A" button to pick up the roll of masking tape.=「A」ボタンを長押ししてマスキングテープを拾いましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the box of garbage bags.=「Y」ボタンを長押ししてゴミ袋を拾いましょう。
Hold down the "B" button to craft a makeshift bodybag.=「B」ボタンを長押しして間に合わせの遺体袋を作りましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the makeshift bodybag.=「Y」ボタンを長押しして間に合わせの遺体袋を拾いましょう。
Press down on the directional pad to drop the makeshift bodybag.=十字キーを押して間に合わせの遺体袋を落としましょう。
Hold down the "A" button to talk to the girl.=「A」ボタンを長押しして話しかけましょう。
Press left on the directional pad and press the "A" button to take out your knife.=十字キーの左を押してから「A」ボタンを押してナイフを持ちましょう。
Press the "X" button.=「X」ボタンを押しましょう。
"Return to the makeshift bodybag you dropped and pick it up by holding down the ""Y"" button.
=間に合わせの遺体袋のある場所に戻り、「Y」ボタンを長押しして拾いましょう。"
Locate the box of garbage bags in the bathroom and pick them up by holding down the "Y" button.=トイレ内のゴミ袋を探し、「Y」ボタンを長押ししてゴミ袋を持ちましょう。
Bring the makeshift bodybag to the corpse and hold down the "A" button to conceal it.=間に合わせの遺体袋を持って死体に近づき、「A」ボタンを長押しして死体を袋に詰めましょう。
Bring the garbage bags to the corpse and hold down the "A" button to wrap the corpse in a bag.=ゴミ袋を持って死体に近づき、「A」ボタンを長押しして死体をゴミ袋に詰めましょう。
Press down on the directional pad to drop the box of garbage bags.=十字キー下を押してゴミ袋を落としましょう。
Locate the bucket in the bathroom and pick it up by holding down the "Y" button.=トイレ内のバケツを探し、「Y」ボタンを長押ししてバケツを持ちましょう。
Bring the bucket to the large sink and hold down the "A" button to fill it with water.=バケツを持って流し台に近づき、「A」ボタンを長押ししてバケツを水で満たしましょう。
Press down on the directional pad to drop the bucket.=十字キー下を押してバケツを落としましょう。
Locate the bleach in the bathroom and pick it up by holding down the "Y" button.=トイレ内の漂白剤を探し、「Y」ボタンを長押しして漂白剤を持ちましょう。
Bring the bleach to the bucket and pour it in by holding down the "A" button.=漂白剤を持ってバケツに近づき、「A」ボタンを長押ししてバケツに注ぎましょう。
Press down on the directional pad to drop the bleach.=十字キー下を押して漂白剤を落としましょう。
Locate the mop in the bathroom and pick it up by holding down the "Y" button.=トイレ内のモップを探し、「Y」ボタンを長押ししてモップを持ちましょう。
Bring the mop to the bucket and dip it in by holding down the "A" button.=モップを持ってバケツに近づき、「A」ボタンを長押しして浸しましょう。
Hold down the "RB" button to activate "Yandere Vision". An orange square will appear around any blood that is present nearby.=「RB」ボタンを長押しすると「ヤンデレビジョン」を使えます。近くの血痕はオレンジの四角で表されます。
Hold down the "A" button to sweep up any blood that is present in the room.=「A」ボタンを長押ししてモップで掃き、血だまりを全て消しましょう。
Press down on the directional pad to drop the mop.=十字キー下を押してモップを落としましょう。
Approach the corpse and hold down the "Y" button to pick it up.=死体に近づき、「Y」ボタンを長押しして死体を持ちましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to dump the corpse into the incinerator.=「Y」ボタンを長押しして死体を焼却炉に捨てましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to dump the weapon into the incinerator.=「Y」ボタンを長押しして武器を焼却炉に捨てましょう。
Hold down the "A" button to open the locker door.=「A」ボタンを長押ししてロッカーのドアを開きましょう。
Hold down the "B" button to remove your blood-stained clothing.=「B」ボタンを長押しして返り血の付いた服を脱ぎましょう。
Hold down the "A" button to take a shower.=「A」ボタンを長押ししてシャワーを浴びましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to change into your gym clothing.=「Y」ボタンを長押しして体操服を着ましょう。
Approach the blood-stained clothing you dropped and pick it up by holding down the "Y" button.=先ほど落とした返り血の付いた服に近づき、「Y」ボタンを長押しして拾いましょう。
Hold down the "Y" button to dump the bloody clothing into the incinerator.=「Y」ボタンを長押しして返り血の付いた服を捨てましょう。
Hold down the "A" button to activate the incinerator.=「A」ボタンを長押しして焼却炉を起動させましょう。
At the bottom-right corner of the screen, you can see your current Sanity. Press the "A" button to continue.=画面右下に現在の「正気度」が表示されます。「A」ボタンを押すと続行します。
Your Sanity is low. Rapidly press the RB button to laugh until your Sanity returns to 100%.=正気度が下がっています。「RB」ボタンを連打して正気度を100%まで回復させましょう。
At the bottom-left corner of the screen, you can see your current Reputation. Press the "A" button to continue.=画面左下には現在の「評判」が表示されています。「A」ボタンを押すと続行します。
Hold down the "A" button to talk to this student.=「A」ボタンを長押しして話しかけましょう。
Tilt the left control stick up to highlight the "Apologize" option. Then, press the "A" button.=左スティックを上に動かして「謝る」の選択肢を選び、「A」ボタンを押しましょう。
At the top-right corner of the screen, you can see the current time of day. Press the "A" button to continue.=画面右上には、現在の時刻が表示されています。「A」ボタンを押すと続行します。
It's time to go home. You can explore the school, or click the right stick to spawn a trail and follow it to the school exit.=そろそろ家に帰る時間ですね。学校内を探索してもいいですし、左スティックを押し込むと出口までの道のりが表示されるので、そこから下校することもできます。
It's time to go home. You can explore the school, or click the left stick to spawn a trail and follow it to the school exit.=下校時間です。学校内を探索してもいいですし、左スティックを押し込むと出口までの道のりが表示されるので、そこから下校することもできます。


コピペ元出力
KokonaとAyanoの会話
Hey, Yan-chan!=Oi, Yan-chan!
*Giggle*=Hihi
We're trying to rehearse for a play, but the lead actress isn't here...=Estamos tentando ensaiar para uma peça, mas a atriz principal não está aqui...
Would you mind filling in for her?=Você se importaria de substituir ela?
Would you like to participate in a tutorial that will teach you the game's core mechanics?=Você gostaria de participar de um tutorial que ensinará as mecânicas básicas do jogo?
C'mon, it'll be fun!=Vamos, vai ser divertido!
It's a play about a serial killer! (Giggle)=É uma peça sobre um assassino em série! (Hihi)
Sorry. I can't. I'm...busy...today.=Desculpe. Não posso. Estou...ocupada...hoje.
Ohhh...I, I understand. Heh...uh, bye, then!=Ah, entendi. Heh...ah, tchau então!
Okay...I'll help.=Certo...Eu ajudo.
Yay! Come with me, Yan-chan!=Yay! Venha comigo, Yan-chan!

チュートリアル
Tutorial Menu=Menu de Tutorial
Wait - Yan-chan, that's not right. But, don't worry, it's okay! We'll just start over and try again!=Espera - Yan-chan, isso não está certo. Mas não se preocupe, tudo bem! Vamos começar de novo e tentar novamente!

Weapons, Attacking, and Sanity=Armas, Ataques e Sanidade
The killer picked up the knife that was on the table...=A assassina pegou a faca que estava na mesa...
Approach the knife and hold down the "R" key to pick it up.=Aproxime-se da faca e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-la.
Approach the knife and hold down the "Y" button to pick it up.=Aproxime-se da faca e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegá-la.
Then, she went on a killing spree, murdering everyone around her!=Então, ela começou uma matança, assassinando todos ao seu redor!
Approach a student and press the "F" key to kill them.=Aproxime-se de um aluno e pressione a tecla "F" para matá-lo.
Approach a student and press the "X" button to kill them.=Aproxime-se de um aluno e pressione o botão "X" para matá-lo.
With each kill, she lost more and more of her sanity, and her attacks became more brutal and savage!=A cada assassinato, ela perdia cada vez mais sua sanidade, e seus ataques se tornavam mais brutais e selvagens!
Continue killing students using the "F" key.=Continue matando alunos usando a tecla "F".
Continue killing students using the "X" button.=Continue matando alunos usando o botão "X".
When the deed was done, she burst into maniacal laughter!=Quando o serviço foi concluído, ela explodiu em uma risada maníaca!
Mash the left CTRL key to laugh and restore lost sanity.=Aperte a tecla CTRL esquerda repetidamente para rir e restaurar a sanidade perdida.
Mash the RB button to laugh and restore lost sanity.=Aperte o botão RB repetidamente para rir e restaurar a sanidade perdida.
Now that she had calmed down, she was able to proceed to the next phase of her plan...=Agora que ela havia se acalmado, estava pronta para prosseguir para a próxima fase de seu plano...

Disposing of Corpses=Descarte de Corpos
Approach a corpse and hold down the "R" key to pick it up.=Aproxime-se de um corpo e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-lo.
Approach a corpse and hold down the "Y" button to pick it up.=Aproxime-se de um corpo e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegá-lo.
The killer quickly began to destroy the evidence of her crime. She picked up one of the corpses...=A assassina rapidamente começou a destruir as evidências de seu crime. Ela pegou um dos corpos...
She carried the corpse to a nearby incinerator...=Ela levou o corpo até um incinerador próximo...
Carry the corpse to the incinerator.=Leve o corpo até o incinerador.
And she dumped the corpse inside.=E ela despejou o corpo dentro.
Once all five corpses were in the incinerator...she activated it.=Depois que todos os cinco corpos estavam no incinerador... ela o ativou.
Dump all corpses into the incinerator. Then, hold down the "E" key to activate the incinerator.=Despeje todos os corpos no incinerador. Em seguida, mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para ativar o incinerador.
Dump all corpses into the incinerator. Then, hold down the "A" button to activate the incinerator.=Despeje todos os corpos no incinerador. Em seguida, mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para ativar o incinerador.
With the corpses incinerated, she prepared to clean up the rest of the evidence...=Com os corpos incinerados, ela se preparou para limpar o resto das evidências...

Mopping up Blood=Limpeza de Sangue
Pick up the bucket with the "R" key.=Pegue o balde com a tecla "R".
Pick up the bucket with the "Y" button.=Pegue o balde com o botão "Y".
The killer started to clean up all of the blood that she had spilled. First, she grabbed a bucket...=A assassina começou a limpar todo o sangue que havia derramado. Primeiro, ela pegou um balde...
Bring the bucket to the sink and fill it with water by holding down the "E" key.=Leve o balde até a pia e encha-o com água mantendo pressionada a tecla "E".
Bring the bucket to the sink and fill it with water by holding down the "A" button.=Leve o balde até a pia e encha-o com água mantendo pressionado o botão "A".
She brought it to a sink, and filled it with water...=Ela o levou até a pia e o encheu de água...
Pick up the bleach with "R", add it to the bucket with "E", pick up the mop with "R", and dip the mop into the bucket.=Pegue o alvejante com "R", adicione-o ao balde com "E", pegue o esfregão com "R" e mergulhe-o no balde.
Pick up the bleach with "Y", add it to the bucket with "A", pick up the mop with "Y", and dip the mop into the bucket.=Pegue o alvejante com "Y", adicione-o ao balde com "A", pegue o esfregão com "Y" e mergulhe-o no balde.
Then, she added bleach to the water, and dipped a mop into the bucket...=Então, ela adicionou alvejante à água e mergulhou um esfregão no balde...
After that, she mopped up every last drop of blood on the ground...=Depois disso, ela esfregou cada gota de sangue no chão...
Hold down the "E" key to sweep the mop.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para esfregar o chão com o esfregão.
Hold down the "A" button to sweep the mop.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para esfregar o chão com o esfregão.
With all of the blood mopped up, she moved on to the next part of the cleanup process...=Com todo o sangue limpo, ela passou para a próxima parte do processo de limpeza...

Changing Clothing=Troca de Roupas
Enter the shower building. Approach your locker and hold down the "E" key to open it.=Entre no prédio do vestiário. Aproxime-se do seu armário e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para abri-lo.
Enter the shower building. Approach your locker and hold down the "A" button to open it.=Entre no prédio do vestiário. Aproxime-se do seu armário e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para abri-lo.
The killer quickly ran to the shower building to clean herself up. She opened up her locker...=A assassina correu rapidamente para o prédio do vestiário para se limpar. Ela abriu seu armário...
She removed her blood-splattered outfit and changed into a towel...=Ela tirou a roupa manchada de sangue e trocou por uma toalha...
Hold down the "Q" key to remove your clothing and wear a towel.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "Q" para tirar a roupa e colocar a toalha.
Hold down the "B" button to remove your clothing and wear a towel.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "B" para tirar a roupa e colocar a toalha.
Go deeper into the shower building. Approach a shower and hold down the "E" key to take a shower.=Vá mais fundo no prédio do vestiário. Aproxime-se de um chuveiro e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para tomar um banho.
Go deeper into the shower building. Approach a shower and hold down the "A" button to take a shower.=Vá mais fundo no prédio do vestiário. Aproxime-se de um chuveiro e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para tomar um banho.
Then, she took a shower and washed the blood from her body.=Então, ela tomou um banho e lavou o sangue do corpo.
Once she was clean, she returned to the locker and changed into clean clothing.=Depois de se limpar, ela voltou ao armário e trocou de roupa.
Return to your locker. Change into clean clothing.=Volte ao seu armário. Troque de roupa.
Perfectly clean. Now, nobody would suspect that she'd just committed murder a few minutes ago!=Perfeitamente limpa. Agora, ninguém suspeitaria que ela havia cometido um assassinato poucos minutos atrás...

Cleaning Evidence=Limpeza de Evidências
The killer carried the murder weapon to a drinking fountain and used water to wash the blood away...=A assassina levou a arma do crime até um bebedouro e usou água para lavar o sangue...
Approach the drinking fountain and hold the "E" key to wash the blood off of the weapon.=Aproxime-se do bebedouro e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para lavar o sangue da arma.
Approach the drinking fountain and hold the "A" button to wash the blood off of the weapon.=Aproxime-se do bebedouro e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para lavar o sangue da arma.
Approach the drinking fountain and hold the "E" key to wash the blood off of the weapon.=Aproxime-se da fonte e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para lavar o sangue da arma.
Approach the drinking fountain and hold the "A" button to wash the blood off of the weapon.=Aproxime-se da fonte e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para lavar o sangue da arma.
Then, she picked up the clothes that she had worn during her killing spree...=Então, ela pegou as roupas que havia usado durante o massacre...
Approach the blood-stained clothing and hold the "R" key to pick it up.=Aproxime-se das roupas ensanguentadas e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-las.
Approach the blood-stained clothing and hold the "Y" button to pick it up.=Aproxime-se das roupas ensanguentadas e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegá-las.
Take the blood-stained clothing to the nearby washing machine and hold the "R" key to put it inside.=Leve as roupas ensanguentadas para a máquina de lavar próxima e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para colocá-las dentro.
Take the blood-stained clothing to the nearby washing machine and hold the "Y" button to put it inside.=Leve as roupas ensanguentadas para a máquina de lavar próxima e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para colocá-las dentro.
She brought the blood-stained clothing to a washing machine...tossed it inside...=Ela levou as roupas ensanguentadas até a máquina de lavar... e as colocou dentro...
And activated it, wiping away the last piece of evidence that connected her to the crime.=E a ligou, apagando a última peça de evidência que a ligava ao crime...
Hold down the "E" key to activate the washing machine.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para ligar a máquina de lavar.
Hold down the "A" button to activate the washing machine.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para ligar a máquina de lavar.
Mmmmm...just thought of something. Instead of cleaning the evidence, she could have just...dumped it into the incinerator along with the corpses, you know? Ah, well...guess it works either way.=Hmm... acabei de pensar em algo. Em vez de limpar a evidência, ela poderia ter apenas... jogado tudo no incinerador junto com os corpos, sabe? Bem, acho que funciona de qualquer forma.

Causing Distractions=Causando Distrações
Go behind the wall.=Vá para trás da parede.
The killer needed to steal a key, but a witness was nearby. So, she hid behind a nearby wall...=A assassina precisava roubar uma chave, mas um testemunha estava por perto. Então, ela se escondeu atrás de uma parede próxima...
Press the left CTRL key to giggle.=Pressione a tecla CTRL esquerda para rir baixinho.
Press the RB button to giggle.=Pressione o botão RB para rir baixinho.
Once she was hidden from view, she performed a creepy giggle.=Uma vez escondida da vista, ela fez um riso sinistro.
The witness - confused and unsettled by this unexpected sound - began to investigate the noise.=A testemunha - confusa e incomodada com esse som inesperado - começou a investigar o barulho.
Wait for the target to start walking.=Espere o alvo começar a andar.
Approach the key and hold down the "E" key to obtain it.=Aproxime-se da chave e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para pegá-la.
Approach the key and hold down the "A" button to obtain it.=Aproxime-se da chave e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para pegá-la.
While the witness was distracted, the killer quickly grabbed the unguarded key.=Enquanto a testemunha estava distraída, a assassina rapidamente pegou a chave desprotegida.
With the key in hand, the killer was able to proceed to the next phase of her master plan...=Com a chave em mãos, a assassina pôde prosseguir para a próxima fase de seu plano mestre...

Dismembering Corpses=Desmembrando Corpos
The killer wanted to dispose of a corpse...but witnesses were nearby. So, she put on a raincoat...=A assassina queria se livrar de um corpo... mas havia testemunhas por perto. Então, ela vestiu uma capa de chuva...
Approach the raincoat and hold the "E" key to wear it.=Aproxime-se da capa de chuva e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para vesti-la.
Approach the raincoat and hold the "A" button to wear it.=Aproxime-se da capa de chuva e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para vesti-la.
Put a tarp underneath the corpse of her latest victim...=Coloque uma lona embaixo do corpo de sua última vítima...
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the tarp, bring it to the corpse, and hold down the "E" key to place it under the corpse.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar a lona, leve-a até o corpo e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para colocá-la embaixo do corpo.
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the tarp, bring it to the corpse, and hold down the "A" button to place it under the corpse.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegar a lona, leve-a até o corpo e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para colocá-la embaixo do corpo.
Grabbed a circular saw, and chopped her victim's corpse into pieces.=Pegou uma serra circular e cortou o corpo de sua vítima em pedaços.
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the circular saw, bring it to the corpse, and hold down the "E" key to dismember the corpse.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar a serra circular, leve-a até o corpo e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para desmembrar o corpo.
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the circular saw, bring it to the corpse, and hold down the "A" button to dismember the corpse.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegar a serra circular, leve-a até o corpo e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para desmembrar o corpo.
She removed the raincoat, dumped the dismembered body parts into the incinerator, and activated it.=Ela tirou a capa de chuva, jogou as partes desmembradas no incinerador e o ativou.
Hold down the "1" key to remove the raincoat, and then dump all the tarp bags into the incinerator.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "1" para remover a capa de chuva e depois jogue todos os sacos de lona no incinerador.
Hold down on the directional pad to remove the raincoat, and then dump all the tarp bags into the incinerator.=Mantenha pressionado o direcional para baixo para remover a capa de chuva e depois jogue todos os sacos de lona no incinerador.
She disposed of a corpse in front of a group of witnesses without raising any suspicion! Excellent! =Ela descartou um corpo na frente de um grupo de testemunhas sem levantar suspeitas! Excelente!

Reputation and Socializing=Reputação e Socialização
The killer made a mistake...she allowed a witness to see her while she was covered in blood!=A assassina cometeu um erro... ela deixou uma testemunha vê-la enquanto estava coberta de sangue!
Approach the student.=Aproxime-se do aluno.
Hold down the "E" key to talk to the student. Move the mouse up to select "Apologize" and press the "E" key to apologize for your behavior.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para falar com o aluno. Mova o mouse para cima para selecionar "Desculpe-se" e pressione a tecla "E" para se desculpar pelo seu comportamento.
Hold down the "A" button to talk to the student. Tilt the right control stick up to select "Apologize" and press the "A" button to apologize for your behavior.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para falar com o aluno. Incline o controle direito para cima para selecionar "Desculpe-se" e pressione o botão "A" para se desculpar pelo seu comportamento.
The killer's reputation was at stake! She spoke to the witness and quickly made up an excuse.=A reputação da assassina estava em jogo! Ela falou com a testemunha e rapidamente inventou uma desculpa.
Hold down the "E" key to talk to the student again. Move the mouse up and right to select "Socialize" and press the "E" key to begin socializing.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para falar com o aluno novamente. Mova o mouse para cima e para a direita para selecionar "Socializar" e pressione a tecla "E" para começar a socializar.
Hold down the "A" button to talk to the student again. Tilt the right control stick up and right to select "Socialize" and press the "A" button to begin socializing.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para falar com o aluno novamente. Incline o manche de controle direito para cima e para a direita para selecionar "Socializar" e pressione o botão "A" para começar a socializar.
The witness fell for it! Next, the killer casually socialized with the witness to maintain her act.=A testemunha caiu na armadilha! Em seguida, o assassino socializou casualmente com a testemunha para manter a encenação.
The witness was a member of the Drama Club, so the killer made a positive comment about Drama.=A testemunha era membro do Clube de Drama, então o assassino fez um comentário positivo sobre Drama.
Use the WASD keys to select the "Drama" icon and press the "E" key to talk about Drama.=Use as teclas WASD para selecionar o ícone "Drama" e pressione a tecla "E" para falar sobre Drama.
Use the directional pad to select the "Drama" icon and press the "A" button to talk about Drama.=Use o direcional para selecionar o ícone "Drama" e pressione o botão "A" para falar sobre Drama.
The killer was now on good terms with the witness. Her reputation was safe...for now.=O assassino agora estava em bons termos com a testemunha. Sua reputação estava segura...por enquanto.

Photography and Yandere Vision=Fotografia e Visão Yandere
Hold down the right mouse button to aim your smartphone camera.=Mantenha pressionado o botão direito do mouse para mirar a câmera do smartphone.
Hold down the left trigger to aim your smartphone camera.=Mantenha pressionado o gatilho esquerdo para mirar a câmera do smartphone.
The killer researched her victims thoroughly before killing them. She took out her smartphone...=O assassino pesquisou suas vítimas minuciosamente antes de matá-las. Ela tirou seu smartphone...
Aim your camera at the student's face. Click the left mouse button to take a photo, and press the "E" key to save the photo.=Aponte sua câmera para o rosto do aluno. Clique com o botão esquerdo do mouse para tirar uma foto e pressione a tecla "E" para salvar a foto.
Aim your camera at the student's face. Pull the right trigger to take a photo, and press the "A" button to save the photo.=Aponte sua câmera para o rosto do aluno. Aperte o gatilho direito para tirar uma foto e pressione o botão "A" para salvar a foto.
Snapped a photo of her victim's face, saved it for future use...=Tirou uma foto do rosto da vítima e salvou para uso futuro...
And hid behind a wall before her victim could take notice of her.=E se escondeu atrás de uma parede antes que sua vítima pudesse notá-la.
Hold down the left CTRL key to activate Yandere Vision.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "CTRL" esquerda para ativar a Visão Yandere.
Hold down the RB button to activate Yandere Vision.=Mantenha pressionado o botão RB para ativar a Visão Yandere.
By studying her victim's routine, she could visualize her victim's whereabouts at any point in time.=Estudando a rotina de sua vítima, ela podia visualizar a localização da vítima a qualquer momento.
She could even visualize the presence of nearby objects that would be useful for committing murder!=Ela também podia visualizar a presença de objetos próximos que seriam úteis para cometer o assassinato!

Following and Kidnapping=Seguir e Sequestrar
The killer grabbed a syringe and a tranquilizer. She hid the syringe in her clothing.=O assassino pegou uma seringa e um tranquilizante. Ela escondeu a seringa em suas roupas.
Approach the table. Hold the "R" key to pick up the syringe, and hold the "E" key to obtain the Sedative. Press the "1" button to hide the syringe.=Aproxime-se da mesa. Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar a seringa e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para obter o Sedativo. Pressione o botão "1" para esconder a seringa.
Approach the table. Hold the "Y" button to pick up the syringe, and hold the "A" button to obtain the Sedative. Press down on the directional pad to hide the syringe.=Aproxime-se da mesa. Mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegar a seringa e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para obter o Sedativo. Pressione para baixo no direcional para esconder a seringa.
She spoke to her next victim and convinced the unsuspecting girl to follow her into a secluded room.=Ela falou com sua próxima vítima e convenceu a garota desavisada a segui-la para uma sala isolada.
Talk to the student. Move the mouse up and left and press "E" to ask her a Favor. Move the mouse up and press "E" to ask her to follow you. Walk into the nearby room.=Fale com a aluna. Mova o mouse para cima e para a esquerda e pressione "E" para pedir um favor. Mova o mouse para cima e pressione "E" para pedir que ela a siga. Entre na sala próxima.
Talk to the student. Tilt the left control stick up and left and tap "A" to ask her a Favor. Tilt the left control stick up and tap "A" to ask her to follow you. Walk into the nearby room.=Fale com a aluna. Incline o joystick esquerdo para cima e para a esquerda e pressione "A" para pedir um favor. Incline o joystick esquerdo para cima e pressione "A" para pedir que ela a siga. Entre na sala próxima.
Press the "E" key to close the door. Press the "2" key to take out the syringe. Stand behind the student and press the "F" key to tranquilize her.=Pressione a tecla "E" para fechar a porta. Pressione a tecla "2" para pegar a seringa. Fique atrás da aluna e pressione a tecla "F" para tranquilizá-la.
Press the "A" button to close the door. Tap left on the directional pad to take out the syringe. Stand behind the student and press the "X" button to tranquilize her.=Pressione o botão "A" para fechar a porta. Toque para a esquerda no direcional para pegar a seringa. Fique atrás da aluna e pressione o botão "X" para tranquilizá-la.
She closed the door behind her, took out the syringe, and stabbed the girl from behind!=Ela fechou a porta atrás de si, pegou a seringa e espetou a garota pelas costas!
She dragged the girl's unconscious body to a large case, and dumped her inside of it.=Ela arrastou o corpo inconsciente da garota para uma grande caixa e a jogou dentro dela.
Hold the "Q" key to grab the student's body. Drag the student to the case and hold the "E" key to dump the student inside.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "Q" para pegar o corpo da aluna. Arraste a aluna para a caixa e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para colocá-la dentro.
Hold the "B" button to grab the student's body. Drag the student to the case and hold the "A" button to dump the student inside.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "B" para pegar o corpo da aluna. Arraste a aluna para a caixa e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para colocá-la dentro.
She left the area and returned after midnight to collect the body of her victim with no witnesses.=Ela saiu da área e voltou após a meia-noite para coletar o corpo de sua vítima sem testemunhas.

Poisoning and Drowning=Envenenamento e Afogamento
The killer decided to drown her next victim. First, she grabbed some rat poison...=O assassino decidiu afogar sua próxima vítima. Primeiro, ela pegou um pouco de veneno para ratos...
Hold down the "E" key to collect the Rat Poison.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para pegar o veneno para ratos.
Hold down the "A" button to collect the Rat Poison.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para pegar o veneno para ratos.
Stand behind the wall and press the left CTRL key to giggle.=Fique atrás da parede e pressione a tecla "CTRL" esquerda para rir.
Stand behind the wall and tap the RB button to giggle.=Fique atrás da parede e toque no botão RB para rir.
Next, she used a giggle to lure her victim away from her food...=Em seguida, ela usou uma risada para atrair sua vítima para longe da comida...
Then, while her victim was distracted, she put the rat poison into her meal.=Então, enquanto sua vítima estava distraída, ela colocou o veneno para ratos em sua comida.
Approach the student's food and hold down the "E" key to put the Rat Poison into her food.=Aproxime-se da comida da aluna e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para colocar o veneno para ratos em sua comida.
Approach the student's food and hold down the "A" button to put the Rat Poison into her food.=Aproxime-se da comida da aluna e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para colocar o veneno para ratos em sua comida.
The killer waited until the victim was puking into a toilet, snuck up behind her, and drowned her!=O assassino esperou até que a vítima estivesse vomitando no banheiro, se aproximou por trás e a afogou!
Wait until the student is vomiting, and then approach her and press the "F" key.=Espere até que a aluna esteja vomitando e, em seguida, aproxime-se dela e pressione a tecla "F"
Wait until the student is vomiting, and then approach her and tap the "X" button.=Espere até que a aluna esteja vomitando e então se aproxime dela e pressione o botão "X".
Mmmmm, if she could manage to find some lethal poison...I guess she could put that in the food instead...=Mmmmm, se ela conseguisse encontrar algum veneno letal... Acho que poderia colocar isso na comida em vez disso...

Puddles and Electrocution=Poças e Eletrocussão
Approach the bucket and hold down the "R" key to pick it up.=Aproxime-se do balde e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-lo.
Approach the bucket and hold down the "Y" button to pick it up.=Aproxime-se do balde e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegá-lo.
The killer planned to murder her next victim with electricity. The first step was grabbing a bucket.=A assassina planejou matar sua próxima vítima com eletricidade. O primeiro passo foi pegar um balde.
Approach the sink while holding the bucket and hold down the "E" key to fill the bucket with water.=Aproxime-se da pia enquanto segura o balde e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para encher o balde com água.
Approach the sink while holding the bucket and hold down the "A" button to fill the bucket with water.=Aproxime-se da pia enquanto segura o balde e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para encher o balde com água.
She filled the bucket up with water...=Ela encheu o balde com água...
Approach the victim and hold down the "E" key to dump water at her feet.=Aproxime-se da vítima e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para derramar água aos pés dela.
Approach the victim and hold down the "A" button to dump water at her feet.=Aproxime-se da vítima e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para derramar água aos pés dela.
And dumped the water on the ground at her victim's feet.=E derramou a água no chão aos pés da vítima.
Then, she picked up a car battery and threw it into the puddle of water!=Então, ela pegou uma bateria de carro e a jogou na poça de água!
Approach the car battery and hold down the "R" key to pick it up. Then approach the victim and hold down the "E" key to throw the car battery.=Aproxime-se da bateria de carro e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-la. Então, aproxime-se da vítima e mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para jogar a bateria de carro na poça de água.
Approach the car battery and hold down the "Y" button to pick it up. Then approach the victim and hold down the "A" button to throw the car battery.=Aproxime-se da bateria de carro e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegá-la. Então, aproxime-se da vítima e mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para jogar a bateria de carro na poça de água.
Even as she stood over the corpse of her latest victim, she was already planning her next murder...=Mesmo enquanto ela estava em cima do corpo da sua última vítima, ela já estava planejando seu próximo assassinato...

Heroes and Struggling=Heróis e Luta
As the killer continued to take lives, she encountered different types of victims.=À medida que a assassina continuava a tirar vidas, ela encontrava diferentes tipos de vítimas.
Approach the knife on the table and hold down the "R" key to pick up the knife=Aproxime-se da faca na mesa e mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegá-la.
Approach the knife on the table and hold down the "Y" button to pick up the knife=Aproxime-se da faca na mesa e mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegá-la.
Approach the girl and press the "F" key to kill her.=Aproxime-se da menina e pressione a tecla "F" para matá-la.
Approach the girl and tap the "X" button to kill her.=Aproxime-se da menina e pressione o botão "X" para matá-la.
Most of her victims were easy to take down...=A maioria das suas vítimas era fácil de derrubar...
But some of them fought back!=Mas alguns deles reagiam!
Wait for the "Heroic Student" to attack you.=Espere que o "Estudante Heroico" ataque você.
Mash the keys displayed onscreen to win the struggle.=Aperte as teclas exibidas na tela para vencer a luta.
Mash the buttons displayed onscreen to win the struggle.=Aperte os botões exibidos na tela para vencer a luta.
Some victims would fight tooth and nail against the killer, attempting to disarm and apprehend her!=Algumas vítimas lutavam com todas as forças contra a assassina, tentando desarmá-la e detê-la!
However, she always stood victorious in the end.=No entanto, ela sempre saía vitoriosa no final.

Traps and Immolation=Armadilhas e Imolação
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the knife. Hold down the "E" key to pick up the thread and masking tape.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar a faca. Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para pegar o fio e a fita adesiva.
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the knife. Hold down the "A" button to pick up the thread and masking tape.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegar a faca. Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para pegar o fio e a fita adesiva.
She prepared to build a tripwire trap. She grabbed a knife, a spool of thread, and masking tape.=Ela se preparou para construir uma armadilha com fio. Pegou uma faca, um rolo de fio e fita adesiva.
Her next victim would die by fire. She grabbed a canister of gasoline and poured it into a bucket.=Sua próxima vítima morreria queimado. Ela pegou um galão de gasolina e despejou em um balde.
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the jerry can. Hold down the "E" key to pour it into the bucket.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar o galão de gasolina. Mantenha pressionada a tecla "E" para despejar no balde.
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the jerry can. Hold down the "A" button to pour it into the bucket.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegar o galão de gasolina. Mantenha pressionado o botão "A" para despejar no balde.
She poured the gasoline into a water cooler and set up the trap.=Ela despejou a gasolina em um purificador de água e armou a armadilha.
Hold down the "R" key to pick up the bucket. Hold the "E" key to pour it into the water cooler. Hold down the "Q" key to create a tripwire trap.=Mantenha pressionada a tecla "R" para pegar o balde. Segure a tecla "E" para despejar no purificador de água. Mantenha pressionada a tecla "Q" para criar uma armadilha com fio.
Hold down the "Y" button to pick up the bucket. Hold the "A" button to pour it into the water cooler. Hold down the "B" button to create a tripwire trap.=Mantenha pressionado o botão "Y" para pegar o balde. Segure o botão "A" para despejar no purificador de água. Mantenha pressionado o botão "B" para criar uma armadilha com fio.
After her unsuspecting victim was covered in gasoline, she used a candle to light her on fire!=Depois que sua vítima desavisada foi coberta com gasolina, ela usou uma vela para queimá-la!
Wait until your victim activates the tripwire trap. Then, pick up the nearby candle by holding down the "R" key and touch your victim with it.=Espere até que sua vítima ative a armadilha com fio. Então, pegue a vela próxima mantendo pressionada a tecla "R" e toque sua vítima com ela.
Wait until your victim activates the tripwire trap. Then, pick up the nearby candle by holding down the "Y" button and touch your victim with it.=Espere até que sua vítima ative a armadilha com fio. Então, pegue a vela próxima mantendo pressionado o botão "Y" e toque sua vítima com ela.
She had killed with blades, water, electricity...and even fire itself. She controlled the elements!=Ela matou com lâminas, água, eletricidade... e até mesmo o fogo. Ela controlava os elementos!

Final Test=Teste Final
Today, she would eliminate her target and dispose of all evidence without being spotted even once.=Hoje, ela eliminaria sua vítima e se livraria de todas as evidências sem ser vista sequer uma vez.
Utilize everything you've been taught to eliminate your target and destroy all evidence without being spotted.=Utilize tudo o que você aprendeu para eliminar sua vítima e destruir todas as evidências sem ser vista.
Congratulations!=Parabéns!
Mission accomplished! There was nothing she could not do. She had become a true master of death!=Missão cumprida! Não havia nada que ela não pudesse fazer. Ela se tornou uma verdadeira mestre da morte!
Dispose of Raincoat=Descarte a Capa de Chuva
Wash Circular Saw=Lave a Serra Circular

...oh...you're...leaving...already...?...um...heh...o-okay...s-see you around...=Ah... você... já está indo?... um... heh... o-okay... a-adeus...
Thanks for your help, Yan-chan!=Obrigada pela ajuda, Yan-chan!
