The president of the Cooking Club.\n\n[c][800000]Suspicious of a ''new bakery'' in town.[-][/c]=A presidente do Clube de Culinária.\n\n[c][800000]Desconfiada de uma ''nova padaria'' na cidade.[-][/c]
Trusted to operate the Cooking Club when the leader of the club is not present. A connoisseur of good food, with a very discerning palate. Dreams of becoming a world-famous 5-star chef.=Confiada para operar o Clube de Culinária na ausência do líder. Uma conhecedora de boa comida, com um paladar muito exigente. Sonha em se tornar um chef 5 estrelas famoso mundialmente.
Committed to maintaining a healthy diet; intends to abstain from junk food for his entire life. He doesn't judge others for their dietary choices, but he evangelizes the benefits of healthy food at every opportunity.=Comprometido em manter uma dieta saudável; pretende se abster de junk food por toda a vida. Ele não julga os outros por suas escolhas alimentares, mas evangeliza os benefícios de uma alimentação saudável em todas as oportunidades.
Ethnically and nationally Japanese, but obsessed with everything western; from western cartoons to western food. Loves to use English words in everyday speech. Believes he was a cowboy in a previous life.=De etnia e nacionalidade japonesa, mas obcecado por tudo o que é ocidental; desde desenhos animados ocidentais até comida ocidental. Adora usar palavras em inglês no dia a dia. Acredita que foi um cowboy em uma vida anterior.
Extremely proud to be Japanese, and celebrates Japanese culture at every opportunity. Dislikes the influence of western culture in Japan. Determined to master the art of preparing Japanese cuisine.=Extremamente orgulhoso de ser japonês e celebra a cultura japonesa em todas as oportunidades. Não gosta da influência da cultura ocidental no Japão. Determinado a dominar a arte de preparar culinária japonesa.
Loves sweets, candy, and desserts. Never gets fat, no matter how much junk food she eats. Kokona Haruka's best friend and closest confidant. Kokona is likely to discuss personal matters with this girl.=Adora doces, guloseimas e sobremesas. Nunca engorda, não importa quanto junk food ela coma. Melhor amiga e confidente mais próxima de Kokona Haruka. Kokona provavelmente discute questões pessoais com essa garota.
Trusted by Kizana Sunobu to operate the Drama Club when she is not present. An aspiring actor with a penchant for giving melodramatic speeches, even when he's not onstage.=Confiado por Kizana Sunobu para operar o Clube de Drama na sua ausência. Um aspirante a ator com um gosto por discursos melodramáticos, mesmo quando não está no palco.
Addicted to making short amateur films - several per month. Despite his young age, he is rapidly gaining experience in directing, producing, scriptwriting, and even video editing.=Viciado em fazer curtas-metragens amadores - vários por mês. Apesar de sua idade jovem, ele está rapidamente ganhando experiência em direção, produção, roteirização e até mesmo edição de vídeo.
Comes from one of the most wealthy families in Japan. He never flaunts his money, but he has an unusually posh way of speaking, which makes his affluent origins very obvious.=Vem de uma das famílias mais ricas do Japão. Ele nunca ostenta seu dinheiro, mas tem um jeito de falar extremamente sofisticado, o que torna suas origens afluentes muito óbvias.
An aspiring actress whose goal is to become the most famous performer in Japan. Because of her headstrong personality, she is constantly at odds with the drama club's leader.=Uma atriz aspirante cujo objetivo é se tornar a artista mais famosa do Japão. Por causa de sua personalidade teimosa, ela está constantemente em conflito com a líder do clube de teatro.
Admires Kizana Sunobu, leader of the Drama Club, and joined the club to learn how to be more like her. This annoys Kizana, who doesn't want anyone imitating her unique style.=Admira Kizana Sunobu, a líder do Clube de Teatro, e entrou no clube para aprender a ser mais como ela. Isso irrita Kizana, que não quer ninguém imitando seu estilo único.
Trusted by Oka Ruto to operate the Occult Club when she is not present. A soft-spoken and introverted young man who doesn't seem passionate about anything...except for black magic, ghosts, and demons.=Confiado por Oka Ruto para operar o Clube do Oculto na sua ausência. Um jovem de fala suave e introvertido que não parece ser apaixonado por nada... exceto por magia negra, fantasmas e demônios.
No student has ever seen the right side of his face.\n\nSome students suspect that he is using his hair to hide an unsightly scar or missing eye.=Nenhum aluno jamais viu o lado direito do seu rosto.\n\nAlguns alunos suspeitam que ele está usando o cabelo para esconder uma cicatriz feia ou um olho ausente.
One of the lenses of his glasses is completely opaque. No student has ever seen his right eye.\n\nSome students suspect that he only has one eye, and prefers to wear an opaque lens over that eye rather than an eyepatch.=Uma das lentes de seus óculos é completamente opaca. Nenhum aluno jamais viu seu olho direito.\n\nAlguns alunos suspeitam que ele tem apenas um olho e prefere usar uma lente opaca em vez de um tapa-olho.
Claims to be wearing a medical eyepatch to correct a problem with her vision.\n\nRefuses to provide details regarding her eye condition, leading to rumors that she is lying about the reason she wears an eyepatch.=Alega estar usando um tapa-olho médico para corrigir um problema de visão.\n\nRecusa-se a fornecer detalhes sobre sua condição ocular, levando a rumores de que ela está mentindo sobre a razão de usar um tapa-olho.
Claims that the bandages on her face are the result of being attacked by a wild animal shortly before the school year began.\n\nThere are rumors that the true reason she wears bandages is because she is regularly beaten by a family member, and was blinded in one eye during a domestic dispute.=Alega que as ataduras em seu rosto são resultado de um ataque de um animal selvagem pouco antes do início do ano letivo.\n\nHá rumores de que a verdadeira razão para ela usar ataduras é porque ela é regularmente espancada por um membro da família e foi cegada em um olho durante uma briga doméstica.
Leader of the Gaming Club. Completely obsessed with anime and video games, and has no other interests or hobbies. Has a somewhat abrasive personality; very few students at school can tolerate him.=Líder do Clube de Jogos. Completamente obcecado por anime e videogames, e não tem outros interesses ou hobbies. Tem uma personalidade um tanto áspera; muito poucos alunos na escola conseguem tolerá-lo.
Secretly has a crush on Pippi Osu. Neither of them realize that they both share feelings for each other.\nSwears to his parents that he spends all of his free time studying, but is usually playing video games.=Secretamente tem uma queda por Pippi Osu. Nenhum dos dois percebe que eles compartilham sentimentos um pelo outro.\nJura aos pais que passa todo o seu tempo livre estudando, mas na verdade está jogando videogames.
Obsessed with rhythm games. Currently, she is addicted to ''Pretty Guardian Miyuki'', an online free-to-play augmented reality role-playing mobile phone game about collecting ''waifus'' and hunting monsters.=Obcecada por jogos de ritmo. Atualmente, ela está viciada em ''Pretty Guardian Miyuki'', um jogo de RPG móvel gratuito com realidade aumentada sobre coletar ''waifus'' e caçar monstros.
Known for irritating her classmates and teachers by constantly asking foolish questions. Stubbornly insists that she is a video game character who can see beyond the fourth wall of the game she's allegedly in.=Conhecida por irritar seus colegas e professores com perguntas tolas. Insiste teimosamente que é uma personagem de videogame que pode ver além da quarta parede do jogo em que supostamente está.
A young woman who is pursuing an ''anime aesthetic''. To achieve this unusual goal, she never cuts her hair, wears special contact lenses, and asks people to refer to her by a nickname inspired by otaku culture.=Uma jovem que está buscando uma ''estética anime''. Para alcançar esse objetivo incomum, ela nunca corta o cabelo, usa lentes de contato especiais e pede que as pessoas a chamem por um apelido inspirado na cultura otaku.
Leader of the Art Club. A man of few words; speaks exclusively in one-word or two-word sentences. Obsessed with painting; does nothing else with his time. Nobody can figure out if he is a silent genius or a pretentious snob.=Líder do Clube de Arte. Um homem de poucas palavras; fala exclusivamente em frases de uma ou duas palavras. Obcecado por pintura; não faz nada além disso com seu tempo. Ninguém consegue descobrir se ele é um gênio silencioso ou um esnobe pretensioso.
A brooding, melancholy boy who exclusively paints very dark and morbid subjects. Although his interests align with the Occult Club, he doesn't seem interested in joining them.=Um menino melancólico e sombrio que pinta exclusivamente temas muito escuros e mórbidos. Embora seus interesses coincidam com os do Clube do Oculto, ele não parece interessado em se juntar a eles.
A vain, narcissistic boy who is obsessed with beauty - especially his own. He is only interested in drawing ''beautiful'' subjects...and self-portraits.=Um garoto vaidoso e narcisista que é obcecado pela beleza - especialmente pela própria. Ele só tem interesse em desenhar ''assuntos bonitos''... e autorretratos.
A quirky, eccentric girl who doesn't really care what others think of her. She only draws bizarre, abstract artwork that doesn't make sense to anyone but herself.=Uma garota peculiar e excêntrica que realmente não se importa com o que os outros pensam dela. Ela só desenha obras de arte bizarras e abstratas que não fazem sentido para ninguém além dela mesma.
An anime-obsessed girl who spends all of her time drawing anime and manga characters. Didn't fit in with the Photography Club or Gaming Club, so she settled for the Art Club.=Uma garota obcecada por anime que passa todo o seu tempo desenhando personagens de anime e mangá. Não se encaixou no Clube de Fotografia ou no Clube de Jogos, então se acomodou no Clube de Arte.
President of the Martial Arts Club. Inherited the club after defeating the previous president.\n\nSeems to be incapable of turning down a challenge.\n\nAlways gung ho and enthusiastic. Sometimes a bit overzealous, especially about martial arts.=Presidente do Clube de Artes Marciais. Herdou o clube depois de derrotar o presidente anterior.\n\nParece incapaz de recusar um desafio.\n\nSempre entusiástico e cheio de energia. Às vezes um pouco exagerado, especialmente com artes marciais.
Made national news earlier this year when he defended a woman who was being mugged by a group of three men, and carried her to a hospital afterwards.\n\nCurrently regarded as Budo's most promising disciple.=Fez notícias nacionais no início deste ano quando defendeu uma mulher que estava sendo assaltada por um grupo de três homens e a levou ao hospital depois.\n\nAtualmente é considerado o discípulo mais promissor de Budo.
Fanatically obsessed with martial arts films since childhood. Joined the Martial Arts Club to be more like his heroes.\n\nPrimarily interested in re-enacting moves from his favorite films, rather than actually developing proper self-defense skills.=Obcecado por filmes de artes marciais desde a infância. Entrou no Clube de Artes Marciais para ser mais como seus heróis.\n\nPrincipalmente interessado em recriar movimentos de seus filmes favoritos, em vez de desenvolver habilidades adequadas de autodefesa.
Shrine maiden at a local shrine. Comes from a very traditional family, and adheres to the Shinto belief system.\n\nEver since her shrine was threatened by thugs, she has been determined to develop martial arts skills in case it becomes necessary to protect herself or her shrine.=Miko em um santuário local. Vem de uma família muito tradicional e adere ao sistema de crenças xintoísta.\n\nDesde que seu santuário foi ameaçado por bandidos, ela está determinada a desenvolver habilidades em artes marciais para o caso de ser necessário proteger a si mesma ou ao seu santuário.
Wanted to start a wrestling club, but couldn't gather enough members. Settled for joining the Martial Arts Club.\n\nAspires to become a professional wrestler. Constantly frustrates Budo by choosing to do flashy wrestling moves instead of using proper martial arts techniques.=Queria começar um clube de wrestling, mas não conseguiu reunir membros suficientes. Optou por entrar no Clube de Artes Marciais.\n\nAspira se tornar uma lutadora profissional. Constantemente frustra Budo ao escolher fazer movimentos de wrestling chamativos em vez de usar técnicas adequadas de artes marciais.
President of the Light Music Club. For most of her life, she was a shy, timid, quiet girl. During the previous school year, she surprised everyone by suddenly changing her appearance and personality overnight. Vocalist for her band, the ''Strawberry Thieves''. Practicing guitar.=Presidenta do Clube de Música Leve. Durante a maior parte de sua vida, era uma garota tímida, reservada e quieta. Durante o ano letivo anterior, surpreendeu a todos ao mudar repentinamente sua aparência e personalidade da noite para o dia. Vocalista da sua banda, ''Strawberry Thieves''. Praticando guitarra.
Disbanded the Light Music Club, dyed her hair back to its original color, removed her piercings, and stopped socializing with others.=Desfez o Clube de Música Leve, tingiu o cabelo de volta para sua cor original, removeu seus piercings e parou de socializar com os outros.
Former president of the Light Music Club. Established her club on a whim, and only used it as a place to hang out with friends. After Miyuji demonstrated a desire to do something meaningful with the club, Gita happily transferred ownership of the club to Miyuji. Plays guitar.=Ex-presidente do Clube de Música Leve. Criou seu clube por um capricho e apenas o usou como um lugar para se encontrar com amigos. Depois que Miyuji demonstrou o desejo de fazer algo significativo com o clube, Gita transferiu felizmente a liderança do clube para Miyuji. Toca guitarra.
The bassist of the Strawberry Thieves. A jack-of-all-trades, she can play almost any instrument, but can't play any of them at a professional level. Leaves complicated stuff to her bandmates. Willing to play backup instruments (such as the maracas) when the song calls for it.=A baixista do Strawberry Thieves. Uma verdadeira 'pau para toda obra', ela pode tocar quase qualquer instrumento, mas não consegue tocar nenhum deles em nível profissional. Deixa as partes complicadas para suas colegas de banda. Disposta a tocar instrumentos de apoio (como maracas) quando a música pede.
The drummer of the Strawberry Thieves. Originally felt uninterested in joining a band, but is now one of the most enthusiastic members. She doesn't mind performing at the back of the stage behind her bandmates, because she becomes shy if there are too many eyes on her.=A baterista do Strawberry Thieves. Originalmenta não estava interessada em entrar para uma banda, mas agora é uma das membros mais entusiasmadas. Não se importa de tocar no fundo do palco atrás das colegas de banda, pois fica tímida se muitos olhares estão voltados para ela.
The keyboardist of the Strawberry Thieves. Strongly prefers synth instruments over traditional acoustic instruments. Firmly believes that the keytar is the coolest instrument to ever be invented. Willing to play backup instruments (such as the cowbell) when the song calls for it.=A tecladista do Strawberry Thieves. Prefere fortemente instrumentos de sintetizador aos tradicionais acústicos. Acredita firmemente que o keytar é o instrumento mais legal já inventado. Disposta a tocar instrumentos de apoio (como o sino) quando a música pede.
Leader of the Photography Club. Has no interest in photography, and uses the clubroom as a place to read manga, eat snacks, and goof around with friends. \n \n Prefers to spend his time slacking off, but when he actually gets serious about something, his resolve is unbreakable.=Líder do Clube de Fotografia. Não tem interesse em fotografia e usa a sala do clube para ler mangás, comer lanches e se divertir com os amigos. \n \n Prefere passar o tempo relaxando, mas quando realmente se dedica a algo, sua determinação é inabalável.
The most laid-back student at school. Never takes anything seriously, and is relaxed at all times. \n \n Despite being lazy most of the time, he cares deeply about his friends, and if any of them were in danger, he would leap at the chance to protect them.=O estudante mais relaxado da escola. Nunca leva nada a sério e está relaxado o tempo todo. \n \n Apesar de ser preguiçoso na maior parte do tempo, se preocupa profundamente com seus amigos, e se algum deles estiver em perigo, ele se apressaria em protegê-los.
Known for taking naps and eating snacks in class. Lazy and flaky, but not a bad person. \n \n Best friends with Rojasu Norubiru, and shares many personality traits with him - including being fiercely protective of his friends.=Conhecido por tirar cochilos e comer lanches na aula. Preguiçoso e indeciso, mas não é uma má pessoa. \n \n Melhor amigo de Rojasu Norubiru, e compartilha muitas características de personalidade com ele - incluindo ser ferozmente protetor com seus amigos.
Grew up with maids and butlers taking care of her every need. Highly concerned with her appearance and clothing at all times. \n \n After befriending Beruma Dinkuri in junior high, the two of them became inseparable despite being polar opposites.=Cresceu com empregadas e mordomos cuidando de todas as suas necessidades. Preocupa-se muito com sua aparência e vestuário o tempo todo. \n \n Depois de se tornar amiga de Beruma Dinkuri no ensino fundamental, as duas se tornaram inseparáveis, apesar de serem opostos extremos.
One of the most hard-working and intelligent students in school. Can get so obsessed with studying that she forgets to take care of herself. \n \n Her flaws are balanced by the strengths of her best friend, Dafuni Bureiku (and vice versa).=Uma das alunas mais esforçadas e inteligentes da escola. Pode ficar tão obcecada com os estudos que se esquece de cuidar de si mesma. \n \n Suas falhas são equilibradas pelas qualidades de sua melhor amiga, Dafuni Bureiku (e vice-versa).
The most intelligent - and eccentric - student at Akademi. Possesses a genius-level IQ, but is prone to extremely bizarre behavior, and frequently expresses thoughts that frighten and concern the people around him.=O estudante mais inteligente - e excêntrico - da Akademi. Possui um QI de nível genial, mas tende a ter comportamentos extremamente bizarros e frequentemente expressa pensamentos que assustam e preocupam as pessoas ao seu redor.
A brilliant young man who made international news after making incredible contributions to the field of holographic technology. Even now, he continues to refine his work and bring science-fiction closer to reality.=Um jovem brilhante que ganhou destaque internacional após fazer contribuições incríveis no campo da tecnologia holográfica. Mesmo agora, continua a refinar seu trabalho e aproximar a ficção científica da realidade.
A young chemist who is obsessed with combining various chemicals to observe the results. Vague and evasive whenever he is questioned about his intentions. His head-mounted device is capable of detecting and displaying his current emotions.=Um jovem químico obcecado por combinar diversos produtos químicos para observar os resultados. Vago e evasivo sempre que é questionado sobre suas intenções. Seu dispositivo montado na cabeça é capaz de detectar e exibir suas emoções atuais.
A young roboticist whose lifelong goal is to build a giant bipedal robot. Known for an overbearing enthusiasm for mecha anime. She has already built several tiny bipedal robots, but each one is always larger and more impressive than the previous one.=Uma jovem robótica cujo objetivo de vida é construir um gigante robô bípede. Conhecida por sua entusiasmo exagerado por anime de mecha. Ela já construiu vários pequenos robôs bípedes, mas cada um é sempre maior e mais impressionante do que o anterior.
A cold and emotionless young woman. Building a robotic replica of herself in the Science Club. Some presume that she is motivated by narcissism, but others theorize that she is attempting to build a replica of her deceased twin sister.=Uma jovem fria e sem emoções. Está construindo uma réplica robótica de si mesma no Clube de Ciências. Alguns presumem que ela é motivada por narcisismo, mas outros teorizam que ela está tentando construir uma réplica de sua falecida irmã gêmea.
A gruff and unfriendly student. Extremely competitive; never turns down a challenge. One of the most physically fit male students at school. Never misses an opportunity to demonstrate his impressive physical strength.=Um estudante grosseiro e antipático. Extremamente competitivo; nunca recusa um desafio. Um dos alunos mais em forma da escola. Nunca perde uma oportunidade de demonstrar sua impressionante força física.
A diligent student. Has known Itachi since childhood, and views him as a rival, even though Itachi usually ignores him. Constantly strives to better himself so that one day he will finally be able to surpass his long-time rival.=Um estudante diligente. Conhece Itachi desde a infância e o vê como um rival, embora Itachi geralmente o ignore. Está sempre se esforçando para melhorar a si mesmo para que um dia possa finalmente superar seu rival de longa data.
A former delinquent. Rumored to have a history of violent behavior. Although he hasn't caused any trouble at Akademi, most people are afraid to speak with him because of the rumors, so he has difficulty making new friends.=Um ex-delinquente. Rumores indicam que ele tem um histórico de comportamento violento. Embora não tenha causado problemas na Akademi, a maioria das pessoas tem medo de falar com ele por causa dos rumores, então ele tem dificuldade em fazer novos amigos.
A former delinquent. Rumored to have a history of violent behavior. Although he hasn't caused any trouble at Akademi High, most people are afraid to speak with him because of the rumors, so he has difficulty making new friends.=Um ex-delinquente. Rumores indicam que ele tem um histórico de comportamento violento. Embora não tenha causado problemas na Akademi High, a maioria das pessoas tem medo de falar com ele por causa dos rumores, então ele tem dificuldade em fazer novos amigos.
A very quiet student who rarely speaks. Always wants to be in the gym, the track, or the pool; takes club activities very seriously. There's a rumor that he joined the Sports Club because he wanted to impress someone he has a crush on.=Um estudante muito quieto que raramente fala. Sempre quer estar no ginásio, na pista ou na piscina; leva as atividades do clube muito a sério. Há um boato de que ele entrou no Clube de Esportes porque queria impressionar alguém de quem gosta.
A friendly student. He's not as strong or fast as his fellow clubmembers, so he usually gets left behind. However, despite all of that, he never gets discouraged, and he never gives up - no matter what. Views Budo Masuta as a role model.=Um estudante amigável. Ele não é tão forte ou rápido quanto seus colegas de clube, então geralmente fica para trás. No entanto, apesar disso, ele nunca se desanima e nunca desiste - não importa o quê. Vê Budo Masuta como um modelo a seguir.
The president of the Gardening Club. Known throughout the school for her kind and caring nature, which has earned her the nickname of ''Everyone's Big Sister''.=A presidente do Clube de Jardinagem. Conhecida em toda a escola por sua natureza gentil e cuidadosa, o que lhe rendeu o apelido de "A Irmã de Todos".
A bright and cheery girl known for her undying loyalty to her friends. Will fiercely support her friends when they're in trouble, sometimes in an overbearing way.=Uma garota brilhante e alegre, conhecida por sua lealdade inabalável aos amigos. Apoiará ferozmente seus amigos quando estiverem em apuros, às vezes de maneira insistente.
Lives with an incurable heart disease, and will most likely die before her 30s. She prefers to live out her days in peace and quiet, and finds comfort in flowers.=Vive com uma doença cardíaca incurável e provavelmente morrerá antes dos 30 anos. Ela prefere viver seus dias em paz e tranquilidade, e encontra conforto nas flores.
A pure-minded girl who is as innocent as possible. Doesn't understand double-entendres, which provides her friends with an endless source of amusement.=Uma garota de mente pura que é o mais inocente possível. Não entende duplos sentidos, o que proporciona aos seus amigos uma fonte interminável de diversão.
A very spiritual girl who has a deep fascination with Japan's history, especially the Shinto religion. Believes in the existence of ''Kami'', ancient Japanese gods.=Uma garota muito espiritual que tem uma profunda fascinação pela história do Japão, especialmente pela religião xintoísta. Acredita na existência dos ''Kami'', antigos deuses japoneses.
Osoro Shidesu, the leader of the delinquent gang, is absent from school. This student is Osoro's right-hand-man, and has been trusted with leading the delinquents while Osoro is absent.=Osoro Shidesu, o líder da gangue de delinquentes, está ausente da escola. Este estudante é o braço direito de Osoro e foi confiado para liderar os delinquentes enquanto Osoro está ausente.
Carries a weapon in the bag on his back. \n Will not hesitate to defend himself if he feels threatened. \n Spends most of his time in the incinerator area behind the school with his fellow delinquents.=Carrega uma arma na bolsa em suas costas. \n Não hesitará em se defender se se sentir ameaçado. \n Passa a maior parte do tempo na área do incinerador atrás da escola com seus colegas delinquentes.
Osoro Shidesu, the leader of the delinquent gang, is absent from school. This student is Osoro's right-hand man, and has been trusted with leading the delinquents while Osoro is absent.=Osoro Shidesu, o líder da gangue de delinquentes, está ausente da escola. Este estudante é o braço direito de Osoro e foi confiado para liderar os delinquentes enquanto Osoro está ausente.
Last year, his flamboyant mannerisms made him the subject of ruthless ridicule, which gradually progressed to intense physical bullying. Since then, he has become prone to using brute force to prove his masculinity.=No ano passado, seus maneirismos extravagantes fizeram dele o alvo de escárnio impiedoso, que gradualmente evoluiu para um intenso bullying físico. Desde então, ele se tornou propenso a usar a força bruta para provar sua masculinidade.
Last year, he suffered a fractured arm from a minor accident, earning him a reputation as a weak and frail boy - and an easy target for bullies. Since then, he has built up his muscles in order to be able to defend himself.=No ano passado, ele sofreu uma fratura no braço por um pequeno acidente, adquirindo a reputação de um menino fraco e frágil - e um alvo fácil para os valentões. Desde então, ele tem fortalecido seus músculos para poder se defender.
Last year, he was relentlessly bullied for showing signs of a receding hairline. His best friend Hokuto stood up for him, and was bullied for doing so. He felt tremendous guilt over this, and developed a smoking habit.=No ano passado, ele foi implacavelmente intimado por mostrar sinais de calvície. Seu melhor amigo Hokuto o defendeu e foi intimado por fazer isso. Ele sentiu uma enorme culpa por isso e desenvolveu o hábito de fumar.
Up until last year, he was an exceptionally quiet person, rarely speaking for any reason at all. This made him a target for bullies. Since then, he has become more likely to express himself with fists rather than words.=Até o ano passado, ele era uma pessoa excepcionalmente quieta, raramente falando por qualquer motivo. Isso o tornou um alvo para os valentões. Desde então, ele se tornou mais propenso a expressar-se com socos em vez de palavras.
A flashy trend-setter who loves to gossip and doesn't take school too seriously. \n \n She is spoiled rotten by her doting father, who buys his daughter anything she wants. \n \n Her father runs a loan agency.=Uma pessoa chamativa e que dita tendências, que adora fofocar e não leva a escola muito a sério. \n \n Ela é mimada pelo pai que a adora, que compra qualquer coisa que sua filha deseja. \n \n Seu pai administra uma agência de empréstimos.
Spends most of her time texting on her phone. \n \n She pretends to be a sweet girl, but becomes quite nasty when provoked. \n \n Her favorite activity is gossiping and spreading rumors.=Passa a maior parte do tempo enviando mensagens pelo telefone. \n \n Ela finge ser uma garota doce, mas fica bastante desagradável quando provocada. \n \n Sua atividade favorita é fofocar e espalhar rumores.
Spends most of her time playing games on her phone. \n \n She pretends to be pure and innocent, but in private, she favors vulgar language and dirty jokes. \n \n Her favorite activity is looking for dirt in people's pasts.=Passa a maior parte do tempo jogando no telefone. \n \n Ela finge ser pura e inocente, mas em particular, gosta de linguagem vulgar e piadas sujas. \n \n Sua atividade favorita é procurar sujeira no passado das pessoas.
Spends most of her time taking selfies with her phone. \n \n She often says that she opposes bullying, but most of her friends are known for mistreating others. \n \n She never admonishes her friends for their cruel behavior.=Passa a maior parte do tempo tirando selfies com o celular. \n \n Ela frequentemente diz que é contra o bullying, mas a maioria de seus amigos é conhecida por maltratar os outros. \n \n Ela nunca repreende seus amigos por seu comportamento cruel.
Spends most of her time browsing the Internet on her phone. \n \n She often preaches about the importance of positivity, but in private, she only says negative things about others. \n \n She operates a hate blog where she shames and ridicules people.=Passa a maior parte do tempo navegando na Internet pelo celular. \n \n Ela frequentemente prega sobre a importância da positividade, mas em privado, só fala coisas negativas sobre os outros. \n \n Ela administra um blog de ódio onde menospreza e ridiculariza as pessoas.
Last year's student council president, and this year's vice president. Currently substituting for the absent president. Known for being formal at all times.=Presidente do conselho estudantil do ano passado e vice-presidente deste ano. Atualmente substituindo o presidente ausente. Conhecido por ser formal o tempo todo.
Treasurer of the student council. A mysterious & enigmatic young woman. Known to be calm & relaxed at all times. Some students find her unsettling.=Tesoureira do conselho estudantil. Uma jovem misteriosa e enigmática. Conhecida por ser calma e relaxada o tempo todo. Alguns alunos a acham inquietante.
Secretary of the student council. Seems ditzy and airheaded at first glance, but has never failed in her duties. She has a very large number of male admirers.=Secretária do conselho estudantil. Parece distraída e cabeçuda à primeira vista, mas nunca falhou em suas funções. Ela tem um grande número de admiradores masculinos.
Enforcer of the student council. Charged with the task of maintaining peace throughout the school. Often uses physical intimidation to enforce rules.=Executora do conselho estudantil. Encargada de manter a paz em toda a escola. Frequentemente usa intimidação física para fazer cumprir as regras.
Seems cold and unfriendly, but has consistently proven that she genuinely cares for the well-being of the students of Akademi. Certified to assist in the training of new nurses who are beginning to enter the medical field.=Parece fria e antipática, mas tem consistentemente provado que realmente se preocupa com o bem-estar dos alunos da Akademi. Certificada para ajudar na formação de novos enfermeiros que estão começando a entrar na área médica.
Tidy, organized, punctual, and expects the same of her students. Known for being almost unreasonably strict and uptight. Has failed students for trivial mistakes such as sloppy penmanship or minor grammatical errors.=Organizada, pontual e espera o mesmo de seus alunos. Conhecida por ser quase irracionalmente rígida e meticulosa. Já reprovou alunos por erros triviais, como caligrafia desleixada ou pequenos erros gramaticais.
The youngest faculty member, and a strong proponent of utilizing modern technology to its fullest. Believes that using books instead of computers a waste of time, and prefers for students to turn in their work digitally.=O membro mais jovem do corpo docente, e um forte defensor da utilização máxima da tecnologia moderna. Acredita que usar livros em vez de computadores é uma perda de tempo, e prefere que os alunos entreguem seu trabalho digitalmente.
Proud mother of two little boys who she loves to dote on. Although she has an infinite supply of patience for her own children, she is quick to anger when students misbehave or show a lack of care for their studies.=Orgulhosa mãe de dois garotinhos que adora mimar. Embora tenha uma paciência infinita para seus próprios filhos, ela fica facilmente irritada quando os alunos se comportam mal ou mostram falta de interesse pelos estudos.
Religiously practices Japanese Zen. A firm believer in pacifism and nonviolence. Remains calm at all times, except during the most urgent of emergencies. Absolutely insists on never missing her morning or afternoon tea.=Pratica religiosamente o Zen japonês. Uma firme crente no pacifismo e na não-violência. Permanece calma o tempo todo, exceto durante as emergências mais urgentes. Insiste absolutamente em nunca faltar ao seu chá da manhã ou da tarde.
Possesses genius-level intelligence, but is disorganized and scatterbrained. Frequently loses her personal possessions and misses important deadlines. In the past, many students have taken advantage of her forgetful nature.=Possui uma inteligência de nível genial, mas é desorganizada e distraída. Frequentemente perde suas posses pessoais e perde prazos importantes. No passado, muitos alunos se aproveitaram de sua natureza esquecida.
Completely apathetic, sometimes appearing to be completely detached from reality. A frequent smoker, even though she knows that it bothers those around her. Known to randomly take days off, sometimes vanishing for a full week.=Completamente apática, às vezes parecendo completamente desligada da realidade. Fumante frequente, mesmo sabendo que incomoda aqueles ao seu redor. Conhecida por tirar dias de folga aleatórios, às vezes desaparecendo por uma semana inteira.
Retired competitive swimmer. From age 15 to age 31, she competed in the Olympics 4 times, winning a total of 23 gold medals. She became internationally famous after winning 8 gold medals in a single year. \n Despite her worldwide fame, she is humble, friendly, and very easy to get along with.=Ex-atleta de natação competitiva. Dos 15 aos 31 anos, competiu nas Olimpíadas 4 vezes, ganhando um total de 23 medalhas de ouro. Tornou-se internacionalmente famosa após ganhar 8 medalhas de ouro em um único ano. \n Apesar de sua fama mundial, é humilde, amigável e muito fácil de se conviver.
The school's guidance counselor. \n \n Misbehaving students are sent to her office. \n \n To expel a student, you must catch that student misbehaving and report them to her.=A conselheira escolar. \n \n Alunos que se comportam mal são enviados para seu escritório. \n \n Para expulsar um aluno, você deve pegá-lo cometendo uma infração e relatá-lo a ela.
The school's headmaster. \n \n An extremely reclusive person, he rarely leaves his office or addresses the student body in person. \n \n The center of numerous unsavory rumors, although none have been proven.=O diretor da escola. \n \n Uma pessoa extremamente reclusa, ele raramente sai de seu escritório ou se dirige ao corpo discente pessoalmente. \n \n O centro de vários rumores desagradáveis, embora nenhum tenha sido comprovado.
Trying to look up my information? Don't bother. There is nothing that you need to know about me. You're a client, and I'm a provider. That's all we need to know about each other.=Tentando descobrir minhas informações? Não se preocupe. Não há nada que você precise saber sobre mim. Você é um cliente e eu sou uma prestadora. Isso é tudo o que precisamos saber um sobre o outro.





コピペ元出力
I've seen him in my dreams thousands of times. I see him on the back of my eyelids every time I close my eyes. We're destined to spend the rest of our lives together!=Eu o vi em meus sonhos milhares de vezes. Eu o vejo nas palpebras dos meus olhos sempre que fecho os olhos. Estamos destinados a passar o resto de nossas vidas juntos!
I've seen him in my dreams thousands of times. \n \n I see him on the back of my eyelids every time I blink. \n \n We're destined to spend the rest of our lives together!=Eu o vi em meus sonhos milhares de vezes. \n \n Eu o vejo nas palpebras dos meus olhos sempre que pisco. \n \n Estamos destinados a passar o resto de nossas vidas juntos!
A brutally honest girl with a sharp tongue. A little mischievious, and known to pull pranks. May be hiding a cruel and sadistic side.=Uma garota brutalmente honesta com uma língua afiada. Um pouco travessa e conhecida por fazer pegadinhas. Pode estar escondendo um lado cruel e sádico.
A quiet and introverted girl. Enjoys reading books and listening to soft music. She also loves singing, but is too shy to sing in public.=Uma garota quieta e introvertida. Gosta de ler livros e ouvir música suave. Ela também adora cantar, mas é muito tímida para cantar em público.
A bubbly and easily exciteable girl. Always an energetic ball of sunshine. Nothing makes her more happy than seeing her friends smile.=Uma garota animada e facilmente excitável. Sempre uma bola de energia radiante. Nada a deixa mais feliz do que ver seus amigos sorrirem.
A smart and dependable girl. Seems to know the answer to almost any question. Studies very often, but always makes time for her friends.=Uma garota inteligente e confiável. Parece saber a resposta para quase qualquer pergunta. Estuda com muita frequência, mas sempre arranja tempo para seus amigos.
A moody boy with a short temper. Unwilling to say much about himself or his family. Claims that he prefers to be be alone, but gets sad when his friends are not around.=Um garoto de humor instável e temperamento curto. Relutante em falar muito sobre si mesmo ou sua família. Afirma que prefere estar sozinho, mas fica triste quando seus amigos não estão por perto.
An energetic and fun-loving boy. Loves to make horrible puns. Enjoys pulling small pranks on people, but refuses to do anything mean-spirited.=Um garoto enérgico e divertido. Adora fazer trocadilhos horríveis. Gosta de pregar pequenas peças nas pessoas, mas se recusa a fazer qualquer coisa de mau espírito.
A friendly and outgoing boy. Loves to make new friends, and will be friends with just about anyone. Doesn't like to sit still; always tries to stay active.=Um garoto amigável e extrovertido. Adora fazer novos amigos e será amigo de quase qualquer pessoa. Não gosta de ficar parado; sempre tenta se manter ativo.
A hard-working and diligent boy. Doesn't give up easily, and always tries his best at everything he does. However, he sometimes finds it difficult to express himself.=Um garoto trabalhador e diligente. Não desiste facilmente e sempre dá o seu melhor em tudo o que faz. No entanto, às vezes tem dificuldade em se expressar.
A quiet boy who seems wise beyond his years. Always willing to listen to others' problems, and always gives advice and support to those in need. Firmly pacifistic.=Um garoto quieto que parece ser mais sábio do que sua idade. Sempre disposto a ouvir os problemas dos outros e sempre dá conselhos e apoio a quem precisa. Firmemente pacifista.
A bubbly and cheerful girl who loves to make new friends. Spends most of her time in the school plaza chatting with people.=Uma garota animada e alegre que adora fazer novos amigos. Passa a maior parte do seu tempo na praça da escola conversando com as pessoas.
A spunky tomboy who feels more comfortable around guys than girls. Rumored to have a secret ''dangerous'' hobby.=Uma garota tomboy enérgica que se sente mais confortável na companhia de garotos do que de garotas. Dizem que ela tem um "hobby perigoso" secreto.
A shy bookworm who spends nearly all of her time reading books. Has volunteered to be the school's librarian.=Uma garota tímida e apaixonada por livros que passa quase todo o seu tempo lendo. Se ofereceu para ser a bibliotecária da escola.
A sporty girl who is training hard to be a career athlete. Very serious about eating healthy and getting lots of exercise.=Uma garota esportiva que está treinando duro para se tornar uma atleta profissional. Muito séria sobre comer de forma saudável e se exercitar bastante.
A conceited girl from one of Japan's wealthiest families. Spends her days sunbathing at the school pool instead of studying.=Uma garota vaidosa de uma das famílias mais ricas do Japão. Passa seus dias tomando sol na piscina da escola em vez de estudar.
A friendly and energetic girl who dreams of becoming a pop idol one day. Spends most of her time rehearsing her performances.=Uma garota amigável e enérgica que sonha em se tornar uma pop star um dia. Passa a maior parte do seu tempo ensaiando suas apresentações.
Akademi's top student; the smartest girl in school. Perfect scores on every test, flawless grades in every subject.=A melhor aluna da Akademi; a garota mais inteligente da escola. Notas perfeitas em todos os testes, notas impecáveis em todas as matérias.
An elegant and beautiful girl who embodies the traditional idea of the ''ideal'' Japanese wife. Constantly surrounded by male and female admirers.=Uma garota elegante e bela que personifica a ideia tradicional da "esposa ideal" japonesa. Constantemente cercada por admiradores masculinos e femininos.
An exceptionally attractive girl who has risen to minor stardom as a ''gravure idol.'' Has countless male admirers at school.=Uma garota excepcionalmente atraente que alcançou uma pequena fama como "idol gravure." Tem inúmeros admiradores masculinos na escola.
Became a minor celebrity after she helped the police solve a murder mystery last year. Graduated from Akademi early to become a junior detective. Apparently, that man in the trenchcoat outside the school is her mentor.=Tornou-se uma celebridade menor depois de ajudar a polícia a resolver um mistério de assassinato no ano passado. Se formou na Akademi mais cedo para se tornar uma detetive júnior. Aparentemente, aquele homem de casaco lá fora é seu mentor.
President of the Cooking Club.=Presidente do Clube de Culinária.
President of the Cooking Club. His parents frequently take long business trips away from home, which required him to develop many domestic skills - like cooking - to take care of himself.=Presidente do Clube de Culinária. Seus pais frequentemente fazem longas viagens de negócios, o que o obrigou a desenvolver muitas habilidades domésticas - como cozinhar - para cuidar de si mesmo.
A hopeless romantic - always thinking about love. Openly admits the fact that he only joined the cooking club because he hoped that learning how to cook would impress girls.=Um romântico incurável - sempre pensando em amor. Admite abertamente que só entrou para o clube de culinária porque esperava que aprender a cozinhar impressionasse as garotas.
Mocked by his peers for having ''feminine'' interests, such as cooking. Strongly believes that neither gender should feel excluded from pursuing whatever they are passionate about.=Zombado por seus colegas por ter interesses "femininos", como cozinhar. Acredita firmemente que nenhum gênero deve se sentir excluído de seguir suas paixões.
Abandoned by her parents as a young child and lived on the streets until she was eventually adopted. Learning how to cook so she can make nutritious meals for starving, homeless children.=Abandonada pelos pais quando era pequena e viveu nas ruas até ser eventualmente adotada. Está aprendendo a cozinhar para preparar refeições nutritivas para crianças famintas e sem-teto.
A girl who is utterly incapable of minding her own business. Always personally investigates people who she suspects of doing shady things, which has earned her the nickname of ''Witness-chan''.=Uma garota completamente incapaz de cuidar da própria vida. Sempre investiga pessoalmente pessoas que suspeita de fazer coisas suspeitas, o que lhe rendeu o apelido de "Witness-chan".
A girl who is utterly incapable of minding her own business. Always personally investigates people whom she suspects of doing shady things, which has earned her the nickname of ''Witness-chan''.=Uma garota completamente incapaz de cuidar da própria vida. Sempre investiga pessoalmente pessoas que suspeita de fazer coisas suspeitas, o que lhe rendeu o apelido de "Witness-chan".
President of the Drama Club.=Presidente do Clube de Teatro.
A snooty rich girl who can't resist an opportunity to show off her wealth. Owns a large collection of gaudy jewelry, and wears a different ring to school every day (even though it's against school rules to do so).=Uma garota rica e esnobe que não resiste a uma oportunidade de mostrar sua riqueza. Possui uma grande coleção de joias chamativas e usa um anel diferente na escola todos os dias (mesmo que isso vá contra as regras da escola).
Nephew of a famous director. Admires his uncle and dreams of achieving the same fame and success. Became president of the Drama Club to practice directing and leadership.=Sobrinho de um diretor famoso. Admira seu tio e sonha em alcançar a mesma fama e sucesso. Tornou-se presidente do Clube de Teatro para praticar direção e liderança.
Said to be ''born for the stage'' due to his loud voice and high energy. Can sometimes be a bit abrasive, which is what caused his previous girlfriend to break up with him.=Dizem que ele é "nascido para o palco" devido à sua voz alta e energia elevada. Às vezes, pode ser um pouco áspero, o que fez com que sua namorada anterior terminasse com ele.
Said to be ''born for the stage'' due to his loud voice and high energy. Can sometimes be a bit abraisve, which is what caused his previous girlfriend to break up with him.=Dizem que ele é "nascido para o palco" devido à sua voz alta e energia elevada. Às vezes, pode ser um pouco áspero, o que fez com que sua namorada anterior terminasse com ele.
A shy, socially awkward boy who joined the Drama Club in the hope that it would help him become a bit more outgoing. Has come to enjoy acting, but prefers working backstage.=Um garoto tímido e socialmente desajeitado que entrou para o Clube de Teatro na esperança de se tornar um pouco mais extrovertido. Começou a gostar de atuar, mas prefere trabalhar nos bastidores.
A pompous but incredibly gifted actress who dreams of becoming a movie star. Rumored to occasionally use her acting abilities to decieve people for her benefit, but vehemently denies this claim.=Uma atriz pomposa, mas incrivelmente talentosa, que sonha em se tornar uma estrela de cinema. Dizem que ela usa suas habilidades de atuação para enganar as pessoas para seu benefício, mas ela nega veementemente essa alegação.
A snooty rich girl who can't resist an opportunity to show off her wealth. Owns a large collection of gaudy jewelry, and wears a different ring to school every day.=Uma garota rica e esnobe que não resiste a uma oportunidade de mostrar sua riqueza. Possui uma grande coleção de joias chamativas e usa um anel diferente na escola todos os dias.
President of the Occult Club.=Presidente do Clube de Ocultismo.
Studying the occult out of a desire to discover a way to communicate with his deceased mother. Became the President of the Occult Club after the founder of the club graduated.=今は亡き母親と話すためにオカルトを学んでいる。オカルト部の創設者が卒業した後、部長になった。
An avid reader whose favorite genre is horror. Joined the Occult Club due to his love of horror novels, and does not actually wish to summon or worship demons.=ホラーをこよなく愛する小説家。ホラー小説が好きでオカルト部に入ったが、悪魔召喚などには興味が無い。
Miraculously survived a car accident that should have killed him. After waking up in the hospital, he claimed to have seen spirits and visions of the afterlife.=交通事故で大けがを負ったが奇跡的に生還した。死の淵をさまよっている間に、死後の世界を見たらしい。
Claims to be a natural-born spirit medium and psychic, but has never been able to demonstrate her powers to the satisfaction of skeptics.=生まれつき霊感がある超能力者だと自称しているが、疑う人を納得させるほどの力を見せたわけではない。
The daughter of a rich businessman. Doesn't want her family's wealth to define her, and tries to hide her affluence. Has found acceptance from the ''outcasts'' in the Occult Club.=金持ちの実業家の娘。家柄を自慢することは無く、自分の豊かさを隠している。オカルト部の「はみ出し者」たちにも受け入れられている。
President of the Newspaper Club. Writes the ''Akademi Daily'' column in the school newspaper.=新聞部の部長。「アカデミ・デイリー」というコラムを書いている。
President of the Newspaper Club. Writes the ''Akademi Daily'' column in the school newspaper. Idolizes a young female detective who inspired her to pursue investigative journalism.=新聞部の部長。「アカデミ・デイリー」というコラムを書いている。ジャーナリストを目指すきっかけとなった若い女性刑事に憧れている。
President of the Newspaper Club. Writes the ''Akademi Daily'' column in the school newspaper. Idolizes a young female detective who inspired him to pursue investigative journalism.=新聞部の部長。「アカデミ・デイリー」というコラムを書いている。ジャーナリストを目指すきっかけとなった若い女性刑事に憧れている。
The sports columnist for the school newspaper. Loves sports, but has never excelled at physical activities. Decided that being a sports journalist was the best way to pursue his interests.=校内新聞でスポーツのコラムを書いている。スポーツは好きだが、運動は苦手。スポーツジャーナリストになるのが、自分の興味に合うと考えている。
The advice columnist of the school newspaper. Loves to help people. Whether it's through his column or in person, he is always willing to lend a helping hand to his fellow students.=校内新聞で人生相談の欄を書いている。人助けが好きで、同級生によく手を差し伸べている。
The gossip columnist of the school newspaper. Obsessed with hunting down the latest ''juicy drama.'' Seems to know everything about everyone; almost nothing escapes her knowledge.=校内新聞でゴシップを書いている。「美味しい揉め事」を追いかけることに夢中。みんなのことを何でも知っており、知らないことは無いらしい。
The current events columnist of the school newspaper. Her father is a rich and famous television news anchor, and she dreams of following in his footsteps and pursuing the same career.=校内新聞で時事問題を書いている。父親は有名なニュースキャスターで、自身も同じ職業に就くことを夢見ている。
President of the Art Club.=美術部の部長
An art prodigy who is already making decent money by selling his pantings. Became the President of the Art Club in order to mentor others and pass on the knowledge he has developed.=絵を売ってそれなりの収入を得ている天才画家。自分の知識を他の人に伝えるため、美術部の部長になった。
An art prodigy who is already making decent money by selling his paintings. Became the President of the Art Club in order to mentor others and pass on the knowledge he has developed.=絵を売ってそれなりの収入を得ている天才画家。自分の知識を他の人に伝えるため、美術部の部長になった。
A talented painter, specializing in portraits. Loves art, but worries that he won't be able to earn a living as a painter. Dreams of being able to pursue his passions without worrying about money.=肖像画が得意な画家。美術が好きだが、画家として食べていけるか不安。お金の心配をせずに自分の情熱を追求するのが夢。
A cartoonist who likes to make people laugh with silly drawings and comics. Currently working on a manga, but refuses to let anyone see it before it is complete.=たわいない絵や漫画で人を笑わせるのが好きな漫画家。現在漫画を描いているが、完成するまでは誰にも見せようとしない。
A landscape painter who enrolled at Akademi purely out of a desire to paint the scenery of the school. Plans to one day travel around the world to paint even more beautiful scenery.=学校の風景を描きたくてAkademiに入学した風景画家。いつか世界中を旅して、もっと美しい風景を書きたいらしい。
Daughter of a rich art curator who grew up surrounded by beautiful masterpieces in her home. Not content to merely admire the work of others, now seeks to create masterpieces herself.=お金持ちの学芸員の娘で、美しい名画に囲まれて育った。他人の作品を見るだけでは飽き足らず、自分でも名作を生みだそうとしている。
President of the Martial Arts Club.=武道部の部長
President of the Martial Arts Club. The oldest of 5 siblings. Considers himself the ''protector'' of his little brothers and sisters. Mastered martial arts to keep his young siblings safe.=武道部の部長。5人兄弟の長男で、自分を弟や妹たちの保護者だと思っている。幼い弟妹たちを守るために武道を身に付けた。
Experienced severe bullying when he was younger due to his love for girly pop music and idols. Joined the Martial Arts Club to learn self defense and protect himself from any further abuse.=幼いころ、女の子らしい音楽やアイドルが好きだったため、酷いいじめに遭った。いじめから身を護るために武道部に入部した。
Gets a thrill from physical confrontration. Loves to start fights. Generally disliked by the other members of the club, who believe that martial arts should only be used in self-defense.=ケンカが大好きで、肉弾戦が特に好き。他の部員は武道は身を護るとき以外で使ってはいけないと考えており、孤立している。
Rejected a love confession at her previous school. The boy she rejected became a stalker and started following her everywhere. Fearing for her life, she decided to learn martial arts.=以前の学校で告白を断ったとき、その男子にストーキングされるようになった。身を護るために武道を習っている。
Comes from ''old money'' - a family that has been rich for many generations. Decided to learn martial arts in case anyone ever tries to kidnap her for ransom, or rob her family's home.=代々続くお金持ちの家系。身代金目的で誘拐されたり、家を襲われたりしたときのために、武道を習うことにした。
President of the Light Music Club. Plays guitar and sings. Doesn't want to use her musical talents for anyone else's benefit but her own.=軽音部の部長。ギターと歌を担当している。自分の音楽の才能を他人のために使いたくないと思っている。
Plays guitar.=ギター担当
Plays bass guitar.=ベース担当
Plays drums.=ドラム担当
From a rich family. Plays keyboard.=裕福な家の出。キーボード担当。
President of the Light Music Club. Talented in both singing and playing the guitar. Trying to start a band called ''Nippon Smiles''. Doesn't like to get involved with anyone who could be a ''competitor'' to her.=軽音部の部長。ギターと歌の才能がある。「ニッポン・スマイルズ」というバンドを結成しようとしている。ライバルになりそうな人とは関わろうとしない。
Plays guitar. Hoping to become a professional musician one day. Sometimes plays guitar on street corners in the hopes that she will be discovered by a talent agent.=ギター担当。プロのミュージシャンを目指している。たまに街角でギターを弾いていると、スカウトマンから声をかけられることがある。
Plays bass guitar. Tried to master the guitar, but found it too difficult; settled for bass since the number of strings was smaller. However, she still hopes to master the guitar one day.=ベース担当。ギターを弾こうとしたが、弦の数が少ないのでベースを弾くことにした。しかし、いつかギターを弾けるようになりたいと思っている。
Plays drums. Known for being a very meek, timid, and soft-spoken young lady. Her quiet nature contrasts greatly with her love of loud and intense drumming.=ドラム担当。とても大人しく、気弱で、物腰の柔らかい少女。性格とは裏腹に、派手で激しいドラムが好き。
Plays keyboard. Her parents operate a successful and prestigious restaurant which has earned them a lot of money. Sometimes, she plays the piano at her parents' restaurant.=キーボード担当。両親が経営する一流レストランが大成功しており、大金持ち。たまに両親のレストランでピアノを弾く。
President of the Photography Club.=写真部の部長
Originally a member of the Newspaper Club before realizing that he enjoyed taking photos more than writing. Switched clubs, then worked his way up to become the President of the Photography Club.=元新聞部だったが、文章を書くより写真を撮る方が楽しいと気付き、写真部の部長になった。
A high academic achiever who enjoys studying the inner workings of cameras. He hopes to eventually learn enough about cameras to advance the field of photographic technology.=優等生で、カメラの内部構造を調べるのが趣味。将来は写真技術を発展させたいと考えており、カメラに関する知識を深めている。
Known for abruptly snapping photographs of his fellow students without warning. This annoys his peers immensely, but provides him with an endless source of amusement.=いきなり同級生を撮影することで有名。友達を困らせては楽しんでいる。
Originally joined the club because of a crush on the club leader. However, she unexpectedly developed a passion for taking photos, and has become quite devoted to photography.=元々は部長が好きで入部したが、写真を撮ることが案外楽しく、写真ののめり込んでいる。
Daughter of a rich CEO. Her father wants her  to inherit his company upon his retirement. However, she has no interest in doing so, and aspires to be a freelance photographer.=裕福な社長の娘。父親から会社の後継者にと見込まれているが、本人にその気はなく、フリーのカメラマンを目指している。
President of the Science Club.=科学部の部長
President of the Science Club. Idolizes famous scientists and inventors, and dreams of one day making a discovery or invention that will make him a prominent figure in history books.=科学部の部長。有名な科学者や発明家を崇めており、いつか歴史に名を残すような発見や発明をするのが夢。
Comes from an old fashioned family and holds very traditional values. Studies science in pursuit of a high-paying career that will allow him to support a wife and children.=歴史の長い家柄で、伝統的な価値観を持っている。家族を養えるような高収入な仕事に就くため、科学を学んでいる。
Born with a illness that has no cure, and has spent much of his life in hospital beds. Determined to perform advanced biomedical research until he can find a cure for his own disease.=生まれつき治療法のない病気で、人生の大半を病院のベッドで過ごした。自分の病気を治せるようになるまで、医学を研究することを決意した。
Born with an illness that has no cure, and has spent much of his life in hospital beds. Determined to perform advanced biomedical research until he can find a cure for his own disease.=生まれつき治療法のない病気で、人生の大半を病院のベッドで過ごした。自分の病気を治せるようになるまで、医学を研究することを決意した。
Loves animals and can't stop himself from trying to take care of every stray cat and dogs she finds on the streets. Plans to study animal biology and become a veterinarian.=動物が大好きで、街で見かけた野良猫や野良犬を片っ端から拾って世話している。将来は獣医学を学び、獣医になる予定。
Loves animals and can't stop herself from trying to take care of every stray cat and dogs she finds on the streets. Plans to study animal biology and become a veterinarian.=動物が大好きで、街で見かけた野良猫や野良犬を片っ端から拾って世話している。将来は獣医学を学び、獣医になる予定。
Loves animals and can't stop herself from trying to take care of every stray cat and dog she finds on the streets. Plans to study animal biology and become a veterinarian.=動物が大好きで、街で見かけた野良猫や野良犬を片っ端から拾って世話している。将来は獣医学を学び、獣医になる予定。
Daughter of a rich jeweler. Interested in learning about the process for synthesizing precious metals. Plans to become an expert on geosciences, particularly gemology.=金持ちの宝石商の娘。貴金属の生成過程に興味がある。将来は地質学、特に宝石額の専門家になる予定。
President of the Sports Club. Actually a friendly guy, even though his default facial expression looks angry.=スポーツ部の部長。普段は怒ったような顔をしているが、実はフレンドリー。
President of the Sports Club. Many people consider him to be intimidating because his resting facial expression makes him look mean, but he is actually a friendly and sociable young man.=スポーツ部の部長。休憩中の表情が意地悪そうなので、威圧的な印象を持つ人も多いが、実は気さくで社交的。
A gifted athelete who is already being scouted by universities. Openly talks about his favorite gravure models without shame, and even keeps gravure magazines in his sports bag.=大学からスカウトされている天才陸上選手。好きなグラビアモデルのことを恥ずかしげもなく語り、バッグの中にいつもグラビア雑誌を入れている。
A swimming fanatic who hopes to compete on a national level someday. Neglects his schoolwork to focus on swimming, leaving him on the verge of failing all of his classes.=全国大会に出場するのが夢の水泳マニア。水泳のために学業がおろそかになり、全科目赤点寸前。
The fastest runner in all of Akademi. Shattered speed records set by other young women her age. Hopes to someday represent Japan in the Summer Olympics as a track and field runner.=Akademiの中で最も足の速い走者。同年代の女性の記録を塗り替えた。夏のオリンピックの陸上日本代表になることを目指している。
Lives with her rich and retired grandparents. Naturally rebellious, she chooses to pursue sports to defy her grandparents, who believe that sports are not an appropriate activity for girls.=お金持ちで引退した祖父母の家に住んでいる。スポーツは女の子に相応しくないという祖父母に反抗し、スポーツの道を選ぶ。
President of the Gardening Club.=園芸部の部長
Known to spend much of his time studying in the school library, which has earned him the nickname ''Study-Kun A.''=図書室でよく勉強しており、「ガリ勉A」と呼ばれている。
Known to spend much of his time studying in the school library, which has earned him the nickname ''Study-Kun B.''=図書室でよく勉強しており、「ガリ勉B」と呼ばれている。
Young environmental activist who regularly attends conservationist rallies and protests. His strong desire to preserve nature eventually lead him to ebcome President of the Gardening Club.=環境保護団体の集会やデモに参加する活動家。自然保護への情熱はすさまじく、園芸部の部長になる。
Young environmental activist who regularly attends conservationist rallies and protests. His strong desire to preserve nature eventually lead him to become President of the Gardening Club.=環境保護団体の集会やデモに参加する活動家。自然保護への情熱はすさまじく、園芸部の部長になる。
Was traumatized after witnessing a horrific crime. Joined the Gardening Club to relax as he recovers from the experience. Harbors a strong contempt for criminals, and considers a career in law enforcement.=とある犯罪を目撃したときに心に傷を負い、そのショックから立ち直るために園芸部に入部した。犯罪者を軽蔑しており、警察官になりたいと思っている。
Pressured by his parents to exceed academically, but would prefer to pursue a career in landscaping instead. Torn between following his passion and living up to his parents' expectations.=両親には学業を優先するよう言われているが、造園の道に進みたいと考えている。自分の情熱を貫くべきか両親の期待に応えるべきかと葛藤している。
A farm girl whose parents spent their life savings to get her into Akademi. Still adapting to her new surroundings, and isn't comfortable unless she's planting crops or flowers.=両親の貯金でAkademiに入学した農家の娘。新しい環境に慣れておらず、農作物や花を植えているとき以外はいつもそわそわしている。
The richest girl in school, but is extremely humble despite her family's immense wealth. Desires a simple life, and plans to use her share of the family fortune to open a small florist shop.=学校一の金持ちだが、非常に謙虚な性格。質素な生活を望んでいて、家の財産を元手に小さな花屋を開きたいらしい。
Enrolled in Akademi against his will by his parents, who made an extremely generous donation to the school in order to ensure that their son's application would be accepted. No interest in education.=両親が学校に多額の寄付をしたため、本人の意思に反して裏口入学した。勉強には興味がない。
Fascinated by delinquent culture and aesthetics. Sees Akademi as a place where he can ''roleplay'' as a delinquent without consequence. When outside of Akademi, his demeanor is completely different.=不良文化とその美学に心酔している。Akademiは自分が不良の「役割」を担う場所だと思っている。Akademi以外では全く違う振舞いをしている。
After numerous failed attempts to attract a girlfriend, he heard that girls are attracted to ''bad boys'', so he completely changed his appearance and behavior and adopted a tough delinquent persona.=何度もフラれた後、不良がモテるという話を聞いて、イメチェンして不良になりきった。
Idolizes his older brother, a successful career criminal. Became a delinquent as part of an attempt to emulate his brother's lifestyle. Provoked a local gang, giving them reason to antagonize him daily.=裏社会で成功している兄にあこがれている。兄の生き方を真似ようとして不良になった。地元の犯罪組織を挑発し、毎日のように狙われている。
Rumored to be an undercover police officer who is conducting an investigation of Akademi while in disguise as a student. Nobody really knows when this rumor started or what evidence may support it.=噂では、学生に扮してAkademiを捜査している潜入捜査官らしい。噂の出どころは誰も知らず、証拠もわからない。
Bullied by boys throughout her life, she gradually began to feel that girls have to stick together to stay safe from predatory boys. With this in mind, she formed a gang with other female victims of bullying.=ずっと男子にいじめられており、女の子同士で団結しないと身を守れないと考え、他のいじめられていた女の子たちとスケバンを結成した。
Pressured by her parents to act like a ''proper lady'' at all times, she eventually rebelled by choosing to develop masculine interests and mannerisms, which caused her former classmates to bully her.=両親から常に「きちんとした女性」として振る舞うよう抑圧されてきたが、反発して男性的な趣味や態度をとり、それがいじめられる原因となっていた。
Bullied at her previous school for having very crooked teeth, oftened called ''shark-like.'' After years of feeling ashamed of her teeth, she eventually decided to make her jagged teeth a part of her identity.=前の学校では、歯がギザギザなせいでサメのようだと言われていじめられていた。ずっと自分の歯を悩んでいたが、最終的に自分の歯をアイデンティティにすることを決心した。
Bullied by her former peers after she developed a romantic interest in a female classmate. Maintains a strong belief that love is love, and that nobody should be shamed for who they develop feelings for.=同級生の女の子に恋をしてしまい、以前の友人たちからいじめられるようになった。誰かを愛することは恥ずべきことじゃないという強い信念を持っている。
Survived a car accident as a child, but was left with a giant X-shaped scar on her back. Her former classmates made a cruel game of throwing objects at her back, trying to ''hit the target.''=幼少期に交通事故に遭い、背中に大きなX字型の傷跡が残った。かつての同級生たちは、背中の傷めがけて物を投げる残酷な的当てゲームをしていた。
The student council president. Known for his cold and icy personality, but has proven to be extremely dependable. Many girls at school fantasize about melting the ice around his cold heart.=生徒会会長。クールな性格で知られているが、非常に頼もしい存在。彼の心の氷を溶かしたいと夢見る女性とも多い。
Treasurer of the student council. Foreign exchange student from Brazil. A genius with numbers. When flustered, speaks in a mix of Japanese and Portuguese words. Many girls at school find him to be ''exotic.''=生徒会会計。ブラジルからの交換留学生で、数学の天才。慌てると日本語とポルトガル語が混じった言葉を話す。エキゾチックな感じが多くの女の子から注目されている。
Secretary of the student council. A humble and modest young man who makes friends very quickly. Completely oblivious to the fact that dozens of girls at school have huge crushes on him.=生徒会書記。謙虚で控えめな男子で、すぐに友達を作れる。何十人もの女の子生徒が彼に夢中になっているが、本人は気づいていない。
Enforcer of the student council. A reformed delinquent who caused a lot of trouble last year, but is working hard to redeem himself. His ''Dangerous Bad Boy'' aura gives him many female admirers.=生徒会執行。去年多くの問題を起こしたが、更生した元不良。依然として危険な不良のオーラを放っており、多くの女性から憧れの的になっている。
A nurse whose true passion is fashion design. Because of her high credentials, she is given leeway on the dress code, and is allowed to wear casual-chic clothing that she designed herself.=ファッションに熱中する養護教諭。高度な資格を持っているため、服装もある程度自由にして良いとされており、自分でデザインしたカジュアルな服を着ることが許可されている。
A sweet, nurturing woman. Loves to talk about her daughter. Sees her students as her honorary children. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=穏やかで優しい女性。娘の話をするのが大好き。生徒を自分の子供のように思っている。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
A carefree woman who wants a casual, friendly relationship with her students. Tries to learn about her students' interests and hobbies. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=のんびりした性格で、生徒たちとは気さくな関係になりたいと思っており、生徒の興味や趣味を知りたがる。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
A stern, austere woman who highly values punctuality. Can't hide her irritation whenever her students are late to class. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=時間を守ることを重視する厳格な女性。生徒が遅刻すると、苛立ちを隠せない。校長からの指示で、武道を習っている。
An attractive woman whom many male students have a crush on. Would prefer to be seen as a competent professional rather than as a beautiful lady. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=魅力的な女性で、多くの男子生徒が憧れている。美女としてよりは、有能な教師として評価されたいと思っている。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
A woman who becomes anxious in small, crowded rooms, and works best in quiet environments without many people around her. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=狭い部屋や人の多い空間では精神が不安定になる女性。人が少なく静かな空間が好み。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
A woman who becomes anxious in small, crowded rooms, and works best in quiet environments without many people around here. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=狭い部屋や人の多い空間では精神が不安定になる女性。人が少なく静かな空間が好み。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
An abrasive woman who won't tolerate any nonsense in her classroom. Is quick to reprimand students for small infractions. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=無礼な態度を許さない、気難しい女性。小さな違反でもすぐに叱責する。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
A blunt woman who does not sugarcoat anything. Doesn't like it when her students tell jokes or use sarcasm in class. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=隠し事をしないぶっきらぼうな女性。生徒が授業中に冗談を言ったり、皮肉を言ったりするのを好まない。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
A determined woman who wants to see her students succeed. Always pushes her students to do their very best. At the headmaster's request, has recieved martial arts training.=生徒の成功を願う女性。いつも生徒の背中を後押しし、最善を尽くさせる。校長の指示で、武道を習っている。
The school's guidance counselor. Misbehaving students are sent to her office. I could get a student expelled by framing them for breaking school rules and reporting them to the counselor...=学校の指導カウンセラー。 素行の悪い生徒は彼女のオフィスに送られる。校則違反した生徒を彼女に報告することで退学にさせることもできそうだ。
The school's guidance counselor. Misbehaving students are sent to her office. I could get a student expelled by framing them for breaking school rules and reporting them to her...=学校の指導カウンセラー。 素行の悪い生徒は彼女のオフィスに送られる。校則違反した生徒を彼女に報告することで退学にさせることもできそうだ。
The school's headmaster. An extremely busy person; rarely leaves his office or addresses the student body in person. Tries to be friendly and trusting towards others, but is growing increasingly paranoid that a killer may be in his school.=校長。非常に多忙な人物で、オフィスから出ることもなく、生徒たちに直接話しかけることもない。他人を信頼し、友好的なふりをしているが、内心では校内に殺人鬼がいるのではと猜疑心を強めている。
The headmaster. An extremely busy person; rarely leaves his office or addresses the student body in person. Has been growing paranoid that there may be a killer in his school.=校長。非常に多忙な人物で、オフィスから出ることもなく、生徒たちに直接話しかけることもない。校内に殺人鬼がいるのではと猜疑心を強めている。
An investigative journalist who spends a lot of time trying to peek inside the school, hoping he'll find a clue to a murder case that he's investigating. He could become a problem in the future...=ジャーナリスト。殺人事件の手がかりを見つけるために、学校の中を覗こうといつも張り込んでいる。将来的に面倒なことになるかもしれない。
An investigative journalist who spends a lot of time trying to peek inside Akademi, attempting to find a clue to prove his theory that one of the school's students is a serial killer.=ジャーナリスト。生徒の中に殺人犯がいるという推理を証明する手がかりを探して、学校の中を覗こうといつも張り込んでいる。
From a rich family.=裕福な家の出

The police arrive at school.=警察が学校に到着した。
The police are unable to locate any corpses on school grounds.=警察は死体を発見できなかった。
The police find clothing that is stained with red paint, but are unable to locate any actual blood stains, and cannot locate any corpses, either.=警察は赤い絵の具まみれの服は見つけたものの、本物の血痕は見つからず、死体も見つからなかった。
The police are unable to locate any murder weapons.=警察は凶器を特定することができなかった。
The police question all students in the school, including Ayano. The police are unable to link Ayano to any crimes.=警察はAyanoを含むすべての生徒に質問した。警察はAyanoを犯行と結びつけることはできなかった。
The police question all students in the school, including Ryoba. The police are unable to link Ryoba to any crimes.=警察はRyobaを含むすべての生徒に質問した。警察はRyobaを犯行と結びつけることはできなかった。
The police question all students in the school, including PikaLoli. The police are unable to link PikaLoli to any crimes.=警察はPikaLoliを含むすべての生徒に質問した。警察はPikaLoliを犯行と結びつけることはできなかった。
The police do not have enough evidence to perform an arrest. The police investigation ends, and students are free to leave.=警察は犯人を逮捕するための十分な証拠を得られなかった。捜査は終了し、生徒は帰宅を許可された。
Ayano is arrested by the police. She will never have Senpai.=Ayanoは逮捕された。もうセンパイを手に入れることはできない。

PikaLoli is arrested by the police. She will never have Senpai.=PikaLoliは逮捕された。もうセンパイを手に入れることはできない。

r:"^Senpai is concerned about the sudden disappearance of (?<name>[A-Z][a-z]+)\. His mental stability has been slightly affected\.$"=センパイは行方不明になった${name}を心配しており、彼のメンタルは少し悪化した。
Your Senpai feels a growing sense of concern that the school may not be safe.=この学校は安全ではないかもとセンパイの不安が募る。
Ayano stalks Senpai until he has returned home, and then returns to her own home.=Ayanoはセンパイを家までストーキングし、それから自分の家に帰った。
Ryoba stalks Senpai until he has returned home, and then returns to her own home.=Ryobaはセンパイを家までストーキングし、それから自分の家に帰った。
PikaLoli stalks Senpai until he has returned home, and then returns to her own home.=PikaLoliはセンパイを家までストーキングし、それから自分の家に帰った。
The student council president has orderd the imprementation of heightened security precoutions. Security cameras and metal detectors are now present at school.=生徒会長は監視警戒態勢を強化するように求めた。監視カメラと金属探知機が学校に設置された。
Ayano returns home, thinking of Senpai every step of the way.=Ayanoはセンパイのことを想いながら家に帰った。
Ryoba returns home, thinking of Senpai every step of the way.=Ryobaはセンパイのことを想いながら家に帰った。
PikaLoli returns home, thinking of Senpai every step of the way.=PikaLoliはセンパイのことを想いながら家に帰った。
The police conclude that a murder-suicide took place, but are unable to take any further action. The police investigation ends, and students are free to leave.=警察は心中事件と結論付け、それ以上の捜査をできなかった。捜査は終了し、生徒は帰宅を許可された。
The police notice that Ayano's clothing is bloody. They confirm that the blood is not hers. Ayano is unable to convince the police that she did not commit murder.=警察は血塗れのAyanoを発見し、その血がAyanoのものでないと分かった。Ayanoは殺人の嫌疑を晴らすことができず逮捕された。
The police find bloody clothing that has traces of Ayano's DNA. Ayano is unable to convince the police that she did not commit murder.=警察は血塗れの服を発見し、その服からAyanoのDNAを検出した。Ayanoは殺人の嫌疑を晴らすことができず逮捕された。
The police notice that Ryoba's clothing is bloody. They confirm that the blood is not hers. Ryoba is unable to convince the police that she did not commit murder.=警察は血塗れのRyobaを発見し、その血がRyobaのものでないと分かった。Ryobaは殺人の嫌疑を晴らすことができず逮捕された。
The police find bloody clothing that has traces of Ryoba's DNA. Ryoba is unable to convince the police that she did not commit murder.=警察は血塗れの服を発見し、その服からRyobaのDNAを検出した。Ryobaは殺人の嫌疑を晴らすことができず逮捕された。
The police notice that PikaLoli's clothing is bloody. They confirm that the blood is not hers. PikaLoli is unable to convince the police that she did not commit murder.=警察は血塗れのPikaLoliを発見し、その血がPikaLoliのものでないと分かった。PikaLoliは殺人の嫌疑を晴らすことができず逮捕された。
The police find bloody clothing that has traces of PikaLoli's DNA. PikaLoli is unable to convince the police that she did not commit murder.=警察は血塗れの服を発見し、その服からPikaLoliのDNAを検出した。PikaLoliは殺人の嫌疑を晴らすことができず逮捕された。
It appears as though a student has fallen from the school rooftop.=どうやら学校の屋上から落下死したようだ。
The faculty members agree to call the police and report the student's death.=教職員は警察を呼ぶことにし、生徒が死亡したことを伝えた。
The police inspect the corpse of a student who appears to have fallen to their death from the school rooftop. The police treat the incident as a murder case, and search the school for any other victims.=警察は屋上から落下死したと推測される死体を検分した。殺人事件の可能性が高いとして他の被害者が居ないか学校を捜索した。
It appears as though a student has committed suicide.=どうやら学校の屋上から飛び降り自殺をしたようだ。
The police inspect the corpse of a student who appears to have fallen to their death from the school rooftop. The police find a suicide note, and conclude that the deceased student probably took their own life. However, they still search the school for clues and evidence.=警察は屋上から落下死したと推測される死体を検分した。遺書が見つかり、自殺と判断されたが、その後も捜査を継続し証拠を収集した。
The police inspect the corpse of a student who appears to have fallen to their death from the school rooftop. The police find a suicide note, but still treat the incident as a potential murder case, and search the school for any other victims.=警察は屋上から落下死したと推測される死体を検分した。遺書が見つかったものの、殺人事件も視野に入れ、他の被害者が居ないか学校を捜索した。
The police witness actual evidence of the supernatural, are absolutely horrified, and run for their lives.=警察は超常現象に遭遇し、恐怖に駆られて逃げだした。
The police believe that they have arrested the perpetrator of the crime. The police investigation ends, and students are free to leave.=警察は事件の犯人を逮捕したと信じ込んだ。捜査は終了し、生徒は帰宅を許可された。
The police find mysterious blood stains, but are unable to locate any corpses on school grounds.=警察は校内で謎の血痕を発見したが、死体は発見できなかった。
The police discover more than five corpses on school grounds.=警察は5体以上の死体を発見した。
The police find multiple severed body parts at school.=警察は複数のバラバラ死体を発見した。
The headmaster has ordered the implementation of heightened security precautions. Security cameras and metal detectors are now present at school.=校長は警備を強化することにした。校内には監視カメラと金属探知機が設置された。
The student council president has ordered the implementation of heightened security precautions. Security cameras and metal detectors are now present at school.=生徒会長は警備を強化することにした。校内には監視カメラと金属探知機が設置された。
The police investigate the security camera recordings, but cannot find anything incriminating in the footage.=警察は防犯カメラの映像を確認するが、手がかりは得られなかった。
The police investigate the security camera recordings, and find incriminating footage of Ryoba.=警察が防犯カメラの映像を確認すると、犯行中のRyobaが映っていた。
The police investigate the security camera recordings, and find incriminating footage of Ayano.=警察が防犯カメラの映像を確認すると、犯行中のAyanoが映っていた。
The police investigate the security camera recordings, and find incriminating footage of PikaLoli.=警察が防犯カメラの映像を確認すると、犯行中のPikaLoliが映っていた。
One student accuses Ayano of murder, but nobody else can corroborate that students' claims, so the police are unable to develop reasonable justification to arrest Ayano.=一人の学生がAyanoを殺人犯として告発したが、その学生の主張を誰も裏付けることができず、警察はAyanoを逮捕する正当な理由を得られなかった。
One student accuses Ryoba of murder, but nobody else can corroborate that students' claims, so the police are unable to develop reasonable justification to arrest Ryoba.=一人の学生がRyobaを殺人犯として告発したが、その学生の主張を誰も裏付けることができず、警察はRyobaを逮捕する正当な理由を得られなかった。
One student accuses PikaLoli of murder, but nobody else can corroborate that students' claims, so the police are unable to develop reasonable justification to arrest PikaLoli.=一人の学生がPikaLoliを殺人犯として告発したが、その学生の主張を誰も裏付けることができず、警察はPikaLoliを逮捕する正当な理由を得られなかった。
Several students accuse Ayano of murder, but there are not enough witnesses to provide the police with reasonable justification to arrest her.=数人がAyanoを殺人犯として告発したが、その学生の主張を誰も裏付けることができず、警察はAyanoを逮捕する正当な理由を得られなかった。
Several students accuse Ryoba of murder, but there are not enough witnesses to provide the police with reasonable justification to arrest her.=数人がRyobaを殺人犯として告発したが、その学生の主張を誰も裏付けることができず、警察はRyobaを逮捕する正当な理由を得られなかった。
Several students accuse PikaLoli of murder, but there are not enough witnesses to provide the police with reasonable justification to arrest her.=数人がPikaLoliを殺人犯として告発したが、その学生の主張を誰も裏付けることができず、警察はPikaLoliを逮捕する正当な理由を得られなかった。
Numerous students accuse Ayano of murder, providing the police with enough justification to arrest her.=沢山の生徒がAyanoを犯人だと証言し、警察はAyanoの逮捕に踏み切った。
Numerous students accuse Ryoba of murder, providing the police with enough justification to arrest her.=沢山の生徒がRyobaを犯人だと証言し、警察はRyobaの逮捕に踏み切った。
Numerous students accuse PikaLoli of murder, providing the police with enough justification to arrest her.=沢山の生徒がPikaLoliを犯人だと証言し、警察はPikaLoliの逮捕に踏み切った。

The Gaming Club makes the decision to disband.=ゲーム部は活動をやめることにした。
